2692200Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UniqueAttribute : ValidationAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Type DataContextType { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public Type EntityType { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public string PropertyName { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public UniqueAttribute(Type dataContextType, Type entityType, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataContextType = dataContextType;Di2015NewLine        EntityType = entityType;Di2015NewLine        PropertyName = propertyName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool IsValid(object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string str = (string) value;Di2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(str))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Cleanup the stringDi2015NewLine        str = str.Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Construct the data contextDi2015NewLine        ConstructorInfo constructor = DataContextType.GetConstructor(new Type[0]);Di2015NewLine        DataContext dataContext = (DataContext)constructor.Invoke(new object[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the tableDi2015NewLine        ITable table = dataContext.GetTable(EntityType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the propertyDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo propertyInfo = EntityType.GetProperty(PropertyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Expression: "entity"Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression parameter = Expression.Parameter(EntityType, "entity");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Expression: "entity.PropertyName"Di2015NewLine        MemberExpression property = Expression.MakeMemberAccess(parameter, propertyInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Expression: "value"Di2015NewLine        object convertedValue = Convert.ChangeType(value, propertyInfo.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine        ConstantExpression rhs = Expression.Constant(convertedValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Expression: "entity.PropertyName == value"Di2015NewLine        BinaryExpression equal = Expression.Equal(property, rhs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Expression: "entity => entity.PropertyName == value"Di2015NewLine        LambdaExpression lambda = Expression.Lambda(equal, parameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Instantiate the count method with the right TSource (our entity type)Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo countMethod = QueryableCountMethod.MakeGenericMethod(EntityType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Execute Count() and say "you're valid if you have none matching"Di2015NewLine        int count = (int)countMethod.Invoke(null, new object[] { table, lambda });Di2015NewLine        return count == 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets Queryable.Count<TSource>(IQueryable<TSource>, Expression<Func<TSource, bool>>)Di2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo QueryableCountMethod = typeof(Queryable).GetMethods().First(m => m.Name == "Count" && m.GetParameters().Length == 2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2692476Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WorkContainer:Dictionary<string, object>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T GetKeyValue<T>(string Parameter) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Parameter.StartsWith("[? "))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string key = Parameter.Replace("[? ", "").Replace(" ?]", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (this.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (typeof(T) == typeof(string) )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Special Case for String, especially if the object is a classDi2015NewLine                    // Take the ToString Method not implicit conversionDi2015NewLine                    return (T)Convert.ChangeType(this[key].ToString(), typeof(T));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return (T)this[key];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return default(T);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {                Di2015NewLine            return (T)Convert.ChangeType(Parameter, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2693100Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<IList<Foo>> GroupFoosByWeight(IList<Foo> foos, int weightLimit)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<Foo> list = new List<Foo>();Di2015NewLine    int sumOfWeight = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Foo foo in foos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (sumOfWeight + foo.Weight > weightLimit)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return list;Di2015NewLine            sumOfWeight = 0;Di2015NewLine            list.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        list.Add(foo);Di2015NewLine        sumOfWeight += foo.Weight;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (list.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2693100Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<Foo> foos = new List<Foo>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    new Foo(15), new Foo(32), new Foo(14), new Foo(19), new Foo(27)Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (IList<Foo> list in GroupFoosByWeight(foos, 35))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("{0}\\t{1}", list.Count, list.Sum(f => f.Weight));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2693100Di2015UniqueSeparatorint weightLimit = 35;Di2015NewLineint fooGroup = 0;Di2015NewLineint totalWeight = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFunc<Foo, int> groupIncrementer = f =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (totalWeight + f.Weight > weightLimit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fooGroup++;Di2015NewLine        totalWeight = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    totalWeight += f.Weight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return fooGroup;Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar query = from foo in foosDi2015NewLine            group foo by new { Group = groupIncrementer(foo) }Di2015NewLine                into gDi2015NewLine                select g.AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (IList<Foo> list in query)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("{0}\\t{1}", list.Count, list.Sum(f => f.Weight));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2696128Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool isCompleted = false;Di2015NewLine        int diceRollResult = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // AutoResetEvent is one type of the WaitHandle that you can use for signaling purpose.Di2015NewLine        AutoResetEvent waitHandle = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Thread thread = new Thread(delegate() {Di2015NewLine            Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLine            int numberOfTimesToLoop = random.Next(1, 10);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < numberOfTimesToLoop - 1; i++) {Di2015NewLine                diceRollResult = random.Next(1, 6);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Signal the waiting thread so that it knows the result is ready.Di2015NewLine                waitHandle.Set();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Sleep so that the waiting thread have enough time to get the result properly - no race condition.Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            diceRollResult = random.Next(1, 6);Di2015NewLine            isCompleted = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Signal the waiting thread so that it knows the result is ready.Di2015NewLine            waitHandle.Set();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        thread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (!isCompleted) {Di2015NewLine            // Wait for signal from the dice rolling thread.Di2015NewLine            waitHandle.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Dice roll result: {0}", diceRollResult);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Write("Dice roll completed. Press any key to quit...");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2700707Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetPage()
2700707Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class HttpDownloaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string _referer;Di2015NewLine    private readonly string _userAgent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Encoding Encoding { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public WebHeaderCollection Headers { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Uri Url { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpDownloader(string url, string referer, string userAgent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Encoding = Encoding.GetEncoding("ISO-8859-1");Di2015NewLine        Url = new Uri(url); // verify the uriDi2015NewLine        _userAgent = userAgent;Di2015NewLine        _referer = referer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string GetPage()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(Url);Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_referer))Di2015NewLine            request.Referer = _referer;Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_userAgent))Di2015NewLine            request.UserAgent = _userAgent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        request.Headers.Add(HttpRequestHeader.AcceptEncoding, "gzip,deflate");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Headers = response.Headers;Di2015NewLine            Url = response.ResponseUri;Di2015NewLine            return ProcessContent(response);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string ProcessContent(HttpWebResponse response)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SetEncodingFromHeader(response);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stream s = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine        if (response.ContentEncoding.ToLower().Contains("gzip"))Di2015NewLine            s = new GZipStream(s, CompressionMode.Decompress);Di2015NewLine        else if (response.ContentEncoding.ToLower().Contains("deflate"))Di2015NewLine            s = new DeflateStream(s, CompressionMode.Decompress);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemoryStream memStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        int bytesRead;Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[0x1000];Di2015NewLine        for (bytesRead = s.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length); bytesRead > 0; bytesRead = s.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            memStream.Write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        s.Close();Di2015NewLine        string html;Di2015NewLine        memStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        using (StreamReader r = new StreamReader(memStream, Encoding))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            html = r.ReadToEnd().Trim();Di2015NewLine            html = CheckMetaCharSetAndReEncode(memStream, html);Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return html;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetEncodingFromHeader(HttpWebResponse response)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string charset = null;Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(response.CharacterSet))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Match m = Regex.Match(response.ContentType, @";\\s*charset\\s*=\\s*(?<charset>.*)", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine            if (m.Success)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                charset = m.Groups["charset"].Value.Trim(new[] { '\\'', '"' });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            charset = response.CharacterSet;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(charset))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Encoding = Encoding.GetEncoding(charset);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (ArgumentException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string CheckMetaCharSetAndReEncode(Stream memStream, string html)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Match m = new Regex(@"<meta\\s+.*?charset\\s*=\\s*(?<charset>[A-Za-z0-9_-]+)", RegexOptions.Singleline | RegexOptions.IgnoreCase).Match(html);Di2015NewLine        if (m.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string charset = m.Groups["charset"].Value.ToLower() ?? "iso-8859-1";Di2015NewLine            if ((charset == "unicode") || (charset == "utf-16"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                charset = "utf-8";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Encoding metaEncoding = Encoding.GetEncoding(charset);Di2015NewLine                if (Encoding != metaEncoding)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    memStream.Position = 0L;Di2015NewLine                    StreamReader recodeReader = new StreamReader(memStream, metaEncoding);Di2015NewLine                    html = recodeReader.ReadToEnd().Trim();Di2015NewLine                    recodeReader.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (ArgumentException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return html;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2701460Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum MyButtonLabelValueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    On,Di2015NewLine    OffDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyButton : ButtonDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [Browsable(false)]Di2015NewLine    public override string TextDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return base.Text;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // either do nothing or only accept "On" and "Off". 2703483Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunction IsIISComponentInstalled(ByVal ComponentName)Di2015NewLine    Dim resultDi2015NewLine    Dim intProcessorArchitectureDi2015NewLine    intProcessorArchitecture = GetProcessorArchitectureIIS()Di2015NewLine    If intProcessorArchitecture = 64 ThenDi2015NewLine        '64-bit systemDi2015NewLine        On Error Resume NextDi2015NewLine        Err.ClearDi2015NewLine        result = RegReadDWORD(HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, "SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\InetStp\\Components", ComponentName, 64)Di2015NewLine        If Err.Number <> 0 ThenDi2015NewLine            Err.ClearDi2015NewLine            IsIISComponentInstalled = FalseDi2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            If result = 1 ThenDi2015NewLine                IsIISComponentInstalled = TrueDi2015NewLine            ElseDi2015NewLine                IsIISComponentInstalled = FalseDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    ElseDi2015NewLine        '32-bit systemDi2015NewLine        If RegReadStringIIS("HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\InetStp\\Components\\" & ComponentName) = "1" ThenDi2015NewLine            IsIISComponentInstalled = TrueDi2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            IsIISComponentInstalled = FalseDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFunction GetProcessorArchitectureIIS()Di2015NewLine    Dim strProcessorArchitectureDi2015NewLine    Dim oShellDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Set oShell = CreateObject("Wscript.Shell")Di2015NewLine    strProcessorArchitecture = oShell.RegRead("HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Session Manager\\Environment\\PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    If strProcessorArchitecture = "x86" ThenDi2015NewLine        GetProcessorArchitectureIIS = 32Di2015NewLine RegReadStringIIS = ""Di2015NewLine        Err.clearDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLine    If VarType(RegReadStringIIS) < vbArray ThenDi2015NewLine        If RegReadStringIIS = sRegValue ThenDi2015NewLine            RegReadStringIIS = ""Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLine    On Error Goto 0Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine'-------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine' Reads a REG_SZ value from the local computer's registry using WMI.Di2015NewLine' Parameters:Di2015NewLine'   RootKey - The registry hive (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa390788(VS.85).aspx for a list of possible values).Di2015NewLine'   Key - The key that contains the desired value.Di2015NewLine'   Value - The value that you want to get.Di2015NewLine'   RegType - The registry bitness: 32 or 64.Di2015NewLine'Di2015NewLine'References:Di2015NewLine' 2704821Di2015UniqueSeparatorpivot
2704821Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Quicksort<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine    where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!source.Any())Di2015NewLine        return source;Di2015NewLine    var pivot = source.First();Di2015NewLine    var remaining = source.Skip(1);Di2015NewLine    return remainingDi2015NewLine        .Where(a => a.CompareTo(pivot) <= 0).Quicksort()Di2015NewLine        .Concat(new[] { pivot })Di2015NewLine        .Concat(remaining.Where(a => a.CompareTo(pivot) > 0).Quicksort());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2704821Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<int> GetRandomInput(int seed, int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random rand = new Random(seed);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return rand.Next();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2704821Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sequence = GetRandomInput(248917, 100);Di2015NewLine    int lastNum = 0;Di2015NewLine    bool isSorted = true;Di2015NewLine    foreach (int num in sequence.Quicksort())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (num < lastNum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            isSorted = false;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        lastNum = num;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(isSorted ? "Sorted" : "Not sorted");Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2712643Di2015UniqueSeparatorS[i] = true if we can make sum i and false otherwise.
2712643Di2015UniqueSeparatorS[0] = true // we can always make sum 0: just don't choose any numberDi2015NewLineS[i] = false for all i != 0Di2015NewLinefor each number i in your inputDi2015NewLine    for s = MaxSum downto iDi2015NewLine        if ( S[s - i] == true )Di2015NewLine            S[s] = true; // if we can make the sum s - i, we can also make the sum s by adding i to the sum s - i.Di2015NewLine
2712643Di2015UniqueSeparatorP[i] = the last number that was used to make sum i
2712643Di2015UniqueSeparatorif
2712643Di2015UniqueSeparatorO(numberOfNumbers * maxSumOfAllNumbers)
2712643Di2015UniqueSeparator   class ProgramDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<int> testList = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 1000; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                testList.Add(1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(SubsetSum.Find(testList, 1000));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (int index in SubsetSum.GetLastResult(1000))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static class SubsetSumDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static Dictionary<int, bool> memo;Di2015NewLine        private static Dictionary<int, KeyValuePair<int, int>> prev;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static SubsetSum()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            memo = new Dictionary<int, bool>();Di2015NewLine            prev = new Dictionary<int, KeyValuePair<int, int>>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool Find(List<int> inputArray, int sum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            memo.Clear();Di2015NewLine            prev.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            memo[0] = true;Di2015NewLine            prev[0] = new KeyValuePair<int,int>(-1, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < inputArray.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int num = inputArray[i];Di2015NewLine                for (int s = sum; s >= num; --s)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (memo.ContainsKey(s - num) && memo[s - num] == true)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        memo[s] = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (!prev.ContainsKey(s))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            prev[s] = new KeyValuePair<int,int>(i, num);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return memo.ContainsKey(sum) && memo[sum];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<int> GetLastResult(int sum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (prev[sum].Key != -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return prev[sum].Key;Di2015NewLine                sum -= prev[sum].Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2713653Di2015UniqueSeparatorDirectoryInfo
2713653Di2015UniqueSeparatorstruct AllDirectories {Di2015NewLine  public List<string> DirectoriesWithoutFiles { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  public List<string> DirectoriesWithFiles { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class FileSystemScanner {Di2015NewLine  public AllDirectories DivideDirectories(string startingPath) {Di2015NewLine    var startingDir = new DirectoryInfo(startingPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // allContent IList<FileSystemInfo>Di2015NewLine    var allContent = GetAllFileSystemObjects(startingDir);Di2015NewLine    var allFiles = allContent.Where(f => !(f.Attributes & FileAttributes.Directory))Di2015NewLine                             .Cast<FileInfo>();Di2015NewLine    var dirs = allContent.Where(f => (f.Attributes & FileAttributes.Directory))Di2015NewLine                         .Cast<DirectoryInfo>();Di2015NewLine    var allDirs = new SortedList<DirectoryInfo>(dirs, new FileSystemInfoComparer());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var res = new AllDirectories {Di2015NewLine      DirectoriesWithFiles = new List<string>()Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    foreach (var file in allFiles) {Di2015NewLine      var dirName = Path.GetDirectoryName(file.Name);Di2015NewLine      if (allDirs.Remove(dirName)) {Di2015NewLine        // Was removed, so first time this dir name seen.Di2015NewLine        res.DirectoriesWithFiles.Add(dirName);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // allDirs now just contains directories without filesDi2015NewLine    res.DirectoriesWithoutFiles = new List<String>(addDirs.Select(d => d.Name));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  class FileSystemInfoComparer : IComparer<FileSystemInfo> {Di2015NewLine    public int Compare(FileSystemInfo l, FileSystemInfo r) {Di2015NewLine      return String.Compare(l.Name, r.Name, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2713653Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetAllFileSystemObjects
2713653Di2015UniqueSeparatorILIst<FileSystemInfo> GetAllFileSystemObjects(DirectoryInfo root) {Di2015NewLine  return root.GetFileSystemInfos("*.*", SearchOptions.AllDirectories);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2713653Di2015UniqueSeparatorILIst<FileSystemInfo> GetAllFileSystemObjects(DirectoryInfo root) {Di2015NewLine  var res = new List<FileSystemInfo>();Di2015NewLine  var pending = new Queue<DirectoryInfo>(new [] { root });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  while (pending.Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine    var dir = pending.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine    var content = dir.GetFileSystemInfos();Di2015NewLine    res.AddRange(content);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var dir in content.Where(f => (f.Attributes & FileAttributes.Directory))Di2015NewLine                               .Cast<DirectoryInfo>()) {Di2015NewLine      pending.Enqueue(dir);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return res;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2713755Di2015UniqueSeparator      public abstract class Singleton<T> where T: classDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static volatile T _instance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static object _lock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected Singleton()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          ConstructorInfo[] constructorPublic = typeof(T).GetConstructors(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine          if (constructorPublic.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(String.Format("{0} has one or more public constructors so the property cannot be enforced.",Di2015NewLine                                              typeof(T).FullName));Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static T InstanceDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          getDi2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            if (_instance == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine              lock (_lock)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                if (_instance == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                  ConstructorInfo constructorNonPublic = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  tryDi2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                    constructorNonPublic = typeof(T).GetConstructor(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic, null,Di2015NewLine                                                            new Type[0], null);Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLine                  catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                    throw e;Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  if (constructorNonPublic == null || constructorNonPublic.IsAssembly)Di2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception(String.Format("A private or protected constructor is missing for {0}",Di2015NewLine                                                      typeof (T).Name));Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 2716653Di2015UniqueSeparatorversions.OrderBy(v => v).Join(";");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine///<summary>Appends a list of strings to a StringBuilder, separated by a separator string.</summary>Di2015NewLine///<param name="builder">The StringBuilder to append to.</param>Di2015NewLine///<param name="strings">The strings to append.</param>Di2015NewLine///<param name="separator">A string to append between the strings.</param>Di2015NewLinepublic static StringBuilder AppendJoin(this StringBuilder builder, IEnumerable<string> strings, string separator) {Di2015NewLine    if (builder == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("builder");Di2015NewLine    if (strings == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("strings");Di2015NewLine    if (separator == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("separator");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool first = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var str in strings) {Di2015NewLine        if (first)Di2015NewLine            first = false;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            builder.Append(separator);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        builder.Append(str);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return builder;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine///<summary>Combines a collection of strings into a single string.</summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static string Join(this IEnumerable<string> strings, string separator) { return new StringBuilder().AppendJoin(strings, separator).ToString(); }Di2015NewLine

2718155Di2015UniqueSeparator///<summary>Finds the index of the first item matching an expression in an enumerable.</summary>Di2015NewLine///<param name="items">The enumerable to search.</param>Di2015NewLine///<param name="predicate">The expression to test the items against.</param>Di2015NewLine///<returns>The index of the first matching item, or -1 if no items match.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static int FindIndex<T>(this IEnumerable<T> items, Func<T, bool> predicate) {Di2015NewLine    if (items == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("items");Di2015NewLine    if (predicate == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("predicate");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int retVal = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in items) {Di2015NewLine        if (predicate(item)) return retVal;Di2015NewLine        retVal++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return -1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine///<summary>Finds the index of the first occurence of an item in an enumerable.</summary>Di2015NewLine///<param name="items">The enumerable to search.</param>Di2015NewLine///<param name="item">The item to find.</param>Di2015NewLine///<returns>The index of the first matching item, or -1 if the item was not found.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static int IndexOf<T>(this IEnumerable<T> items, T item) { return items.FindIndex(i => EqualityComparer<T>.Default.Equals(item, i)); }Di2015NewLine

2719818Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T[,] To2dArray(this List<List<T>> list)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (list.Count == 0 || list[0].Count == 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("The list must have non-zero dimensions.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = new T[list.Count, list[0].Count];Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < list.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for(int j = 0; j < list.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (list[i].Count != list[0].Count)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("The list cannot contain elements (lists) of different sizes.");Di2015NewLine            result[i, j] = list[i][j];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2721367Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.IO.Compression.DeflateStream
2721367Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] Decompress(byte[] buffer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream(buffer))Di2015NewLine    using (Stream zipStream = new DeflateStream(ms, Di2015NewLine                          CompressionMode.Decompress, true))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int initialBufferLength = buffer.Length * 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[initialBufferLength];Di2015NewLine        bool finishedExactly = false;Di2015NewLine        int read = 0;Di2015NewLine        int chunk;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (!finishedExactly && Di2015NewLine              (chunk = zipStream.Read(buffer, read, buffer.Length - read)) > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            read += chunk;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (read == buffer.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int nextByte = zipStream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // End of Stream?Di2015NewLine                if (nextByte == -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    finishedExactly = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    byte[] newBuffer = new byte[buffer.Length * 2];Di2015NewLine                    Array.Copy(buffer, newBuffer, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                    newBuffer[read] = (byte)nextByte;Di2015NewLine                    buffer = newBuffer;Di2015NewLine                    read++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!finishedExactly)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] final = new byte[read];Di2015NewLine            Array.Copy(buffer, final, read);Di2015NewLine            buffer = final;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return buffer;Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLine

2722021Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SO2721939Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public sealed class ZipEntry<T1, T2>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public ZipEntry(int index, T1 value1, T2 value2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Index = index;Di2015NewLine            Value1 = value1;Di2015NewLine            Value2 = value2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Index { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public T1 Value1 { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public T2 Value2 { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class EnumerableExtensionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<ZipEntry<T1, T2>> Zip<T1, T2>(Di2015NewLine            this IEnumerable<T1> collection1, IEnumerable<T2> collection2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (collection1 == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("collection1");Di2015NewLine            if (collection2 == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("collection2");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int index = 0;Di2015NewLine            using (IEnumerator<T1> enumerator1 = collection1.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine            using (IEnumerator<T2> enumerator2 = collection2.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (enumerator1.MoveNext() && enumerator2.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return new ZipEntry<T1, T2>(Di2015NewLine                        index, enumerator1.Current, enumerator2.Current);Di2015NewLine                    index++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int[] numbers = new[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 };Di2015NewLine            string[] names = new[] { "Bob", "Alice", "Mark", "John", "Mary" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var entry in numbers.Zip(names))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Out.WriteLine(entry.Index + ": "Di2015NewLine                    + entry.Value1 + "-" + entry.Value2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2722021Di2015UniqueSeparatorwhile (true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool hasNext1 = enumerator1.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine    bool hasNext2 = enumerator2.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine    if (hasNext1 != hasNext2)Di2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException("One of the collections ran " +Di2015NewLine            "out of values before the other");Di2015NewLine    if (!hasNext1)Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    yield return new ZipEntry<T1, T2>(Di2015NewLine        index, enumerator1.Current, enumerator2.Current);Di2015NewLine    index++;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2725584Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char[] chars = new char[] { '.', '-', '+', '^', '', '*' };Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; ; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Delete the previous char by setting it to a spaceDi2015NewLine                Console.SetCursorPosition(6 - (i-1) % 6 - 1, Console.CursorTop);Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(" ");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Write the new charDi2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(6 - i % 6 - 1, Console.CursorTop);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(chars[i % 6]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2725584Di2015UniqueSeparator@"C:\\some_animated_gif.gif"
2725584Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Image image = Image.FromFile(@"C:\\some_animated_gif.gif");Di2015NewLine        FrameDimension dimension = new FrameDimension(Di2015NewLine                           image.FrameDimensionsList[0]);Di2015NewLine        int frameCount = image.GetFrameCount(dimension);Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Remember cursor positionDi2015NewLine        int left = Console.WindowLeft, top = Console.WindowTop;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        char[] chars = { '#', '#', '@', '%', '=', '+', Di2015NewLine                         '*', ':', '-', '.', ' ' };Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; ; i = (i + 1) % frameCount)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            image.SelectActiveFrame(dimension, i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int h = 0; h < image.Height; h++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int w = 0; w < image.Width; w++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Color cl = ((Bitmap)image).GetPixel(w, h);Di2015NewLine                    int gray = (cl.R + cl.G + cl.B) / 3;Di2015NewLine                    int index = (gray * (chars.Length - 1)) / 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    sb.Append(chars[index]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                sb.Append('\\n');Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(left, top);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2732112Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const int kTiffTagLength = 12;Di2015NewLineprivate const int kHeaderSize = 2;Di2015NewLineprivate const int kMinimumTiffSize = 8;Di2015NewLineprivate const byte kIntelMark = 0x49;Di2015NewLineprivate const byte kMotorolaMark = 0x4d;Di2015NewLineprivate const ushort kTiffMagicNumber = 42;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool IsTiff(Stream stm)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    stm.Seek(0);Di2015NewLine    if (stm.Length < kMinimumTiffSize)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    byte[] header = new byte[kHeaderSize];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    stm.Read(header, 0, header.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (header[0] != header[1] || (header[0] != kIntelMark && header[0] != kMotorolaMark))Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    bool isIntel = header[0] == kIntelMark;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ushort magicNumber = ReadShort(stm, isIntel);Di2015NewLine    if (magicNumber != kTiffMagicNumber)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate ushort ReadShort(Stream stm, bool isIntel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] b = new byte[2];Di2015NewLine    _stm.Read(b, 0, b.Length);Di2015NewLine    return ToShort(_isIntel, b[0], b[1]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static ushort ToShort(bool isIntel, byte b0, byte b1)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (isIntel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (ushort)(((int)b1 << 8) | (int)b0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (ushort)(((int)b0 << 8) | (int)b1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2732112Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool IsPdf(Stream stm)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    stm.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine    PdfToken token;Di2015NewLine    while ((token = GetToken(stm)) != null) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (token.TokenType == MLPdfTokenType.Comment) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (token.Text.StartsWith("%PDF-1.")) 2735849Di2015UniqueSeparator     static string HeadsOrTails()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string guessHistory = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        // Guess heads or tails 5 timesDi2015NewLine        Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLine        for (int currentGuess = 0; currentGuess < 5; currentGuess++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (random.Next(2) == 0)Di2015NewLine                guessHistory += 'H';Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                guessHistory += 'T';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Analyse pattern of guessesDi2015NewLine        if (guessHistory.Substring(0, 4) == "HHTT" || guessHistory.Substring(1, 4) == "HHTT")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If guess history contains HHTT then make the 6th guess = HDi2015NewLine            guessHistory += 'H';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return guessHistory;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2737299Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<List<int>> AllSequences(int start, int end, int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (size == 0)Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Repeat<List<int>>(new List<int>(), 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return from i in Enumerable.Range(start, end - size - start + 2)Di2015NewLine           from seq in AllSequences(i + 1, end, size - 1)Di2015NewLine           select new List<int>{i}.Concat(seq).ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2737347Di2015UniqueSeparator// How much deep to scan. (of course you can also pass it to the method)Di2015NewLineconst int HowDeepToScan=20;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void ProcessDir ( string dirName, int recursionLvl, string strFileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  string tabs = new String( '-', recursionLvl );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if ( recursionLvl<=HowDeepToScan )Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Process the list of files found in the directory. Di2015NewLine    string [] fileEntries = Directory.GetFiles( dirName );Di2015NewLine    TextWriter tw = new StreamWriter( strFileName, true );Di2015NewLine    tw.WriteLine( tabs + "<a href=\\" " +  System.IO.Path.GetFullPath( dirName ) + "\\">" + System.IO.Path.GetFileName( dirName ) + "</a><br />" );Di2015NewLine    foreach ( string fileName in fileEntries )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // do something with fileNameDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      tw.WriteLine( tabs + "<a href=\\" " +  System.IO.Path.GetFullPath( fileName ) + "\\">" + System.IO.Path.GetFileName( fileName ) + "</a><br />" );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    tw.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Recurse into subdirectories of this directory.Di2015NewLine    string [] subdirEntries = Directory.GetDirectories( dirName );Di2015NewLine    foreach ( string subdir in subdirEntries )Di2015NewLine      // Do not iterate through reparse pointsDi2015NewLine      if ( ( File.GetAttributes( subdir ) &Di2015NewLine        FileAttributes.ReparsePoint ) !=Di2015NewLine            FileAttributes.ReparsePoint )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ProcessDir( subdir, recursionLvl+1, strFileName );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData bmpData = bmp.LockBits(new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, sourceWidth, sourceHeight), System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode.WriteOnly,Di2015NewLine                       System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine        IntPtr safePtr = bmpData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine        System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(textureData, 0, safePtr, textureData.Length);Di2015NewLine        bmp.UnlockBits(bmpData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //output 2738371Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Delegate to notify UI thread of worker thread progress.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="total">The total to be downloaded.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="downloaded">The amount already downloaded.</param>Di2015NewLine    public delegate void UpdateProgressDelegate(int total, int downloaded);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Updates the progress in a thread-safe manner.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="total">The total.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="downloaded">The downloaded.</param>Di2015NewLine    public void UpdateProgress(int total, int downloaded)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check we are on the right thread.Di2015NewLine        if (!this.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.ProgressBar.Maximum = total;Di2015NewLine            this.ProgressBar.Value = downloaded;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (this != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                UpdateProgressDelegate updateProgress = new UpdateProgressDelegate(this.UpdateProgress);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Executes a delegate on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle.Di2015NewLine                this.Invoke(updateProgress, new object[] { total, downloaded });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2738506Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic decimal GetApproximateAge(DateTime dateOfBirth) {Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan age = DateTime.Now - dateOfBirth;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* a note on the line below:Di2015NewLine     * treating 182.5 days as equivalent to 6 months,Di2015NewLine     * reasoning that this will provide acceptable accuracyDi2015NewLine     * for ages below ~360 yearsDi2015NewLine     * Di2015NewLine     * (result will be 1 day off for roughly every 4 years;Di2015NewLine     * for a calculation of half-years to be inaccurateDi2015NewLine     * would take 4 [years] * ~90 [days] = ~360)Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get age in units of 6 monthsDi2015NewLine    // desired behavior is not to add 0.5 untilDi2015NewLine    // a full six months have elapsed since the user's last birthday --Di2015NewLine    // using Math.Floor to ensure thisDi2015NewLine    double approxAgeInHalfYears = Math.Floor(age.TotalDays / 182.5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now convert this to yearsDi2015NewLine    // did it this way to restrict age to increments of 0.5Di2015NewLine    double approxAgeInYears = approxAgeInHalfYears * 0.5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Convert.ToDecimal(approxAgeInYears);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2738506Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic decimal GetApproximateAge(DateTime dateOfBirth) {Di2015NewLine    DateTime now = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int birthYear = dateOfBirth.Year;Di2015NewLine    int lastYear = now.Year - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // obviously, if the user's alive, he/she had a birthday last year;Di2015NewLine    // therefore he/she is at least this oldDi2015NewLine    int minimumAgeInYears = lastYear - birthYear;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now the question is: how much time has passed since then?Di2015NewLine    double actualAgeInYears = (double)minimumAgeInYears;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // for every six months that have elapsed since the user's birthdayDi2015NewLine    // LAST year, add 0.5 to his/her ageDi2015NewLine    DateTime birthDateLastYear = new DateTime(lastYear, 1, 1)Di2015NewLine        .AddDays(dateOfBirth.DayOfYear);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DateTime comparisonDate = birthDateLastYearDi2015NewLine        .AddMonths(6);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (comparisonDate < now) {Di2015NewLine        actualAgeInYears += 0.5;Di2015NewLine        comparisonDate = comparisonDate.AddMonths(6);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Convert.ToDecimal(actualAgeInYears);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2738506Di2015UniqueSeparatordateOfBirth.AddMonths(6)
2738506Di2015UniqueSeparatordateOfBirth
2738506Di2015UniqueSeparatorDateTime lastBirthDay = GetLastBirthday(dateOfBirth);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (DateTime.Today > lastBirthDay.AddMonths(6))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    adjust = 0.5M;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    adjust = 0M;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDateTime GetLastBirthday(DateTime dateOfBirth)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int currentYear = DateTime.Now.Year;Di2015NewLine    int birthMonth = dateOfBirth.Month;Di2015NewLine    int birthDay = dateOfBirth.Day;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if user was born on Feb 29 and this year is NOT a leap year,Di2015NewLine    // we'll say the user's birthday this year falls on Feb 28Di2015NewLine    if (birthMonth == 2 && birthDay == 29 && !IsLeapYear(currentYear))Di2015NewLine        birthDay = 28;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DateTime birthdayThisYear = new DateTime(Di2015NewLine        currentYear,Di2015NewLine        birthMonth,Di2015NewLine        birthDayDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (DateTime.Today > birthdayThisYear)Di2015NewLine        return birthdayThisYear;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return birthdayThisYear.AddYears(-1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebool IsLeapYear(int year) {Di2015NewLine    return year % 400 == 0 || (year % 4 == 0 && year % 100 != 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2738742Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DateTime CalcDate(string expression, DateTime epoch)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var match = System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(expression, Di2015NewLine                    @"(([+-])(\\d+)([YDM]))+");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (match.Success && match.Groups.Count >= 5)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var signs = match.Groups[2];Di2015NewLine        var counts = match.Groups[3];Di2015NewLine        var units = match.Groups[4];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < signs.Captures.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string sign = signs.Captures[i].Value;Di2015NewLine            int count = int.Parse(counts.Captures[i].Value);Di2015NewLine            string unit = units.Captures[i].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (sign == "-") count *= -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (unit)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case "Y": epoch = epoch.AddYears(count); break;Di2015NewLine                case "M": epoch = epoch.AddMonths(count); break;Di2015NewLine                case "D": epoch = epoch.AddDays(count); break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new FormatException(Di2015NewLine            "The specified expression was not a valid date expression.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return epoch;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2739765Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] Compress(byte[] uncompressed)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    using (GZipStream gzs = new GZipStream(ms, CompressionMode.Compress))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        gzs.Write(uncompressed, 0, uncompressed.Length);Di2015NewLine        gzs.Close();Di2015NewLine        return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static byte[] Decompress(byte[] compressed)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream(compressed))Di2015NewLine    using (GZipStream gzs = new GZipStream(ms, CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream uncompressed = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int r = -1; r != 0; r = gzs.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length))Di2015NewLine            if (r > 0) uncompressed.Write(buffer, 0, r);Di2015NewLine        return uncompressed.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2739765Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] ToByteArray(string hexString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    hexString = hexString.Replace("-", "");Di2015NewLine    int NumberChars = hexString.Length;Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes = new byte[NumberChars / 2];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < NumberChars; i += 2)Di2015NewLine        bytes[i / 2] = Convert.ToByte(hexString.Substring(i, 2), 16);Di2015NewLine    return bytes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2744577Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<T> GetListFromDataTable<T>(DataSet dataSet, string tableName, string rowName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Find out how many rows are in your table and create an aray of that lengthDi2015NewLine    int count = dataSet.Tables[tableName].Rows.Count;Di2015NewLine    List<T> values = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Loop through the table and row and add them into the arrayDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        values.Add((T)dataSet.Tables[tableName].Rows[i][rowName]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return values;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2744596Di2015UniqueSeparatorXmlDocument
2744596Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void RemoveElements(XmlDocument document, string xpathForElementsToRemove)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (document == null || document.DocumentElement == null) return;Di2015NewLine    var xmlNodeList = document.DocumentElement.SelectNodes(xpathForElementsToRemove);Di2015NewLine    if (xmlNodeList == null || xmlNodeList.Count == 0) return;Di2015NewLine    for (var n = xmlNodeList.Count - 1; n >= 0; n--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var xmlNode = xmlNodeList[n];Di2015NewLine        if (xmlNode.ParentNode == null) continue;Di2015NewLine        xmlNode.ParentNode.RemoveChild(xmlNode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2744762Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int PORT_OPEN_MAX_ATTEMPTS = 10;Di2015NewLinebool portOpened = false;Di2015NewLineint portOpenAttempts = 0;                     Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _port = new SerialPort(port, 9600, Parity.None, 8, StopBits.One);                      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (!portOpened)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _port.Open();Di2015NewLine                    portOpened = true;      // Only get here if no exceptionDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                catch (UnauthorizedAccessException ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Log, close, then try againDi2015NewLine                    if (portOpenAttempts++ < PORT_OPEN_MAX_ATTEMPTS)Di2015NewLine                    {                       Di2015NewLine                        _logger.Debug("Port UnauthorizedAccessException. 2746988Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.UI.WebControls;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.UI.HtmlControls;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.UI;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Diplo.WebControls.DataControls.PagerTemplatesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Paging template for the <see cref="DiploGridView"/>Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class RowsPagePreviousNext : ITemplateDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        readonly PagedDataSource _pagedDataSource;Di2015NewLine        readonly DiploGridView DiploGridView;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="RowsPagePreviousNext"/> class.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="pagedDataSource">The <see cref="PagedDataSource"/>.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="DiploGrid">A reference to the <see cref="DiploGridView"/>.</param>Di2015NewLine        public RowsPagePreviousNext(PagedDataSource pagedDataSource, DiploGridView DiploGrid)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _pagedDataSource = pagedDataSource;Di2015NewLine            DiploGridView = DiploGrid;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// When implemented by a class, defines the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control"></see> object that child controls and templates belong to. These child controls are in turn defined within an inline template.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="container">The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control"></see> object to contain the instances of controls from the inline template.</param>Di2015NewLine        void ITemplate.InstantiateIn(Control container)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Literal space = new Literal();Di2015NewLine            space.Text = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            HtmlGenericControl divLeft = new HtmlGenericControl("div");Di2015NewLine            divLeft.Style.Add("float", "left");Di2015NewLine            divLeft.Style.Add(HtmlTextWriterStyle.Width, "25%");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Label lb = new Label();Di2015NewLine            lb.Text = "Show rows: ";Di2015NewLine            divLeft.Controls.Add(lb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DropDownList ddlPageSize = new DropDownList();Di2015NewLine            ListItem item;Di2015NewLine            ddlPageSize.AutoPostBack = true;Di2015NewLine            ddlPageSize.ToolTip = "Select number of rows per page";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int max = (_pagedDataSource.DataSourceCount < 50) ? _pagedDataSource.DataSourceCount : 50;Di2015NewLine            int i;Di2015NewLine            const int increment = 5;Di2015NewLine            bool alreadySelected = false;Di2015NewLine            for (i = increment; i <= max; i = i + increment)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                item = new ListItem(i.ToString());Di2015NewLine                if (i == _pagedDataSource.PageSize)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    item.Selected = true;Di2015NewLine                    alreadySelected = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                ddlPageSize.Items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            item = new ListItem("All", _pagedDataSource.DataSourceCount.ToString());Di2015NewLine            if (_pagedDataSource.DataSourceCount == _pagedDataSource.PageSize && alreadySelected == false)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                item.Selected = true;Di2015NewLine                alreadySelected = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_pagedDataSource.DataSourceCount > (i - increment) && alreadySelected == false)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                item.Selected = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ddlPageSize.Items.Add(item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ddlPageSize.SelectedIndexChanged += new EventHandler(ddlPageSize_SelectedIndexChanged);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            divLeft.Controls.Add(ddlPageSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            HtmlGenericControl divRight = new HtmlGenericControl("div");Di2015NewLine            divRight.Style.Add("float", "right");Di2015NewLine            divRight.Style.Add(HtmlTextWriterStyle.Width, "75%");Di2015NewLine            divRight.Style.Add(HtmlTextWriterStyle.TextAlign, "right");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Literal lit = new Literal();Di2015NewLine            lit.Text = String.Format("Found {0} record{1}. Page ", Di2015NewLine                _pagedDataSource.DataSourceCount, Di2015NewLine                (_pagedDataSource.DataSourceCount == 1) ? String.Empty : "s" );Di2015NewLine            divRight.Controls.Add(lit);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TextBox tbPage = new TextBox();Di2015NewLine            tbPage.ToolTip = "Enter page number";Di2015NewLine            tbPage.Columns = 2;Di2015NewLine            tbPage.MaxLength = 3;Di2015NewLine            tbPage.Text = (_pagedDataSource.CurrentPageIndex + 1).ToString();Di2015NewLine            tbPage.CssClass = "pagerTextBox";Di2015NewLine            tbPage.AutoPostBack = true;Di2015NewLine            tbPage.TextChanged += new EventHandler(tbPage_TextChanged);Di2015NewLine            divRight.Controls.Add(tbPage);Di2015NewLine            if (_pagedDataSource.PageCount < 2)Di2015NewLine                tbPage.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lit = new Literal();Di2015NewLine            lit.Text = " of " + _pagedDataSource.PageCount;Di2015NewLine            divRight.Controls.Add(lit);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            divRight.Controls.Add(space);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Button btn = new Button();Di2015NewLine            btn.Text = "";Di2015NewLine            btn.CommandName = "Page";Di2015NewLine            btn.CommandArgument = "Prev";Di2015NewLine            btn.SkinID = "none";Di2015NewLine            btn.Enabled = !_pagedDataSource.IsFirstPage;Di2015NewLine            btn.CssClass = (btn.Enabled) ? "buttonPreviousPage" : "buttonPreviousPageDisabled";Di2015NewLine            if (btn.Enabled)Di2015NewLine                btn.ToolTip = "Previous page";Di2015NewLine            divRight.Controls.Add(btn);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            btn = new Button();Di2015NewLine            btn.Text = "";Di2015NewLine            btn.CommandName = "Page";Di2015NewLine            btn.CommandArgument = "Next";Di2015NewLine            btn.SkinID = "none";Di2015NewLine            btn.CssClass = "buttonNext";Di2015NewLine            btn.Enabled = !_pagedDataSource.IsLastPage;Di2015NewLine            btn.CssClass = (btn.Enabled) ? "buttonNextPage" : "buttonNextPageDisabled";Di2015NewLine            if (btn.Enabled)Di2015NewLine                btn.ToolTip = "Next page";Di2015NewLine            divRight.Controls.Add(btn);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            container.Controls.Add(divLeft);Di2015NewLine            container.Controls.Add(divRight);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Handles the TextChanged event of the tbPage control.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="sender">The source of the event.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="e">The <see cref="System.EventArgs"/> instance containing the event data.</param>Di2015NewLine        void tbPage_TextChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TextBox tb = sender as TextBox;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (tb != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int page;Di2015NewLine                if (int.TryParse(tb.Text, out page))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (page <= _pagedDataSource.PageCount && page > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        DiploGridView.PageIndex = page - 2748669Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Input;Di2015NewLineusing Petzold.Media3D;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace _3DTesterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class Window1 : WindowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Window1()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* This MouseDown event handler prints:Di2015NewLine          (1) the current position of the mouseDi2015NewLine          (2) the 3D mouse location on the ground plane (z = 0)Di2015NewLine          (3) the 2D mouse location converted from the 3D location */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Window_MouseDown(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var range = new LineRange();Di2015NewLine            var isValid = ViewportInfo.Point2DtoPoint3D(Viewport, e.GetPosition(Viewport), out range);Di2015NewLine            if (!isValid)Di2015NewLine                MouseLabel.Content = "(no data)";Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var point3D = range.PointFromZ(0);Di2015NewLine                var point = ViewportInfo.Point3DtoPoint2D(Viewport, point3D);Di2015NewLine                MouseLabel.Content = e.GetPosition(Viewport) + "\\n" + point3D + "\\n" + point;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2749152Di2015UniqueSeparator// we'll use these to check for rows with nullsDi2015NewLinevar columns = yourTable.ColumnsDi2015NewLine    .Cast<DataColumn>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// say the column you want to sort by is called "Date"Di2015NewLinevar rows = yourTable.Select("", "Date ASC"); // or "Date DESC"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (var writer = new StreamWriter(yourPath)) {Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < rows.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        DataRow row = rows[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // check for any null cellsDi2015NewLine        if (columns.Any(column => row.IsNull(column)))Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] textCells = row.ItemArrayDi2015NewLine            .Select(cell => cell.ToString()) // may need to pick a text qualifier hereDi2015NewLine            .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // check for non-null but EMPTY cellsDi2015NewLine        if (textCells.Any(text => string.IsNullOrEmpty(text)))Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine(string.Join(",", textCells));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2750154Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int TestIterations = 10000000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TimeSpan countTime = TestCounter(c => c.Count());Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Count: {0}", countTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TimeSpan countWithNewTime = TestCounter(c => c.CountWithNew());Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("CountWithNew: {0}", countWithNewTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TimeSpan countSavedTime = TestCounter(c => c.CountSaved());Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("CountSaved: {0}", countSavedTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic TimeSpan TestCounter(Action<Counter> action, int iterations)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var counter = new Counter();Di2015NewLine    Stopwatch sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine    sw.Start();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < TestIterations; i++)Di2015NewLine        action(counter);Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    return sw.Elapsed;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2750273Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing HtmlAgilityPack;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class HtmlWord {Di2015NewLine    public string Text { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public HtmlNode[] NodeStack { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // convenience property to display list of ancestors cleanlyDi2015NewLine    // (for ease of debugging)Di2015NewLine    public string NodeList {Di2015NewLine        get { return string.Join(", ", NodeStack.Select(n => n.Name).ToArray()); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal HtmlWord(string text, HtmlNode node, HtmlNode top) {Di2015NewLine        Text = text;Di2015NewLine        NodeStack = GetNodeStack(node, top);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static HtmlNode[] GetNodeStack(HtmlNode node, HtmlNode top) {Di2015NewLine        var nodes = new Stack<HtmlNode>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (node != null && !node.Equals(top)) {Di2015NewLine            nodes.Push(node);Di2015NewLine            node = node.ParentNode;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return nodes.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2750273Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing HtmlAgilityPack;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Flags()]Di2015NewLinepublic enum NodeChange {Di2015NewLine    None = 0,Di2015NewLine    Dropped = 1,Di2015NewLine    Added = 2Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class HtmlLine {Di2015NewLine    private List<HtmlWord> _words;Di2015NewLine    public IList<HtmlWord> Words {Di2015NewLine        get { return _words.AsReadOnly(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int WordCount {Di2015NewLine        get { return _words.Count; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HtmlLine(IEnumerable<HtmlWord> words) {Di2015NewLine        _words = new List<HtmlWord>(words);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static NodeChange CompareNodeStacks(HtmlWord x, HtmlWord y, out HtmlNode[] droppedNodes, out HtmlNode[] addedNodes) {Di2015NewLine        var droppedList = new List<HtmlNode>();Di2015NewLine        var addedList = new List<HtmlNode>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // traverse x's NodeStack backwards to see which nodesDi2015NewLine        // do not include y (and are therefore "finished")Di2015NewLine        foreach (var node in x.NodeStack.Reverse()) {Di2015NewLine            if (!Array.Exists(y.NodeStack, n => n.Equals(node)))Di2015NewLine                droppedList.Add(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // traverse y's NodeStack forwards to see which nodesDi2015NewLine        // do not include x (and are therefore "new")Di2015NewLine        foreach (var node in y.NodeStack) {Di2015NewLine            if (!Array.Exists(x.NodeStack, n => n.Equals(node)))Di2015NewLine                addedList.Add(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        droppedNodes = droppedList.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        addedNodes = addedList.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        NodeChange change = NodeChange.None;Di2015NewLine        if (droppedNodes.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            change &= NodeChange.Dropped;Di2015NewLine        if (addedNodes.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            change &= NodeChange.Added;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // could maybe use this in some later revision?Di2015NewLine        // not worth the effort right now...Di2015NewLine        return change;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString() {Di2015NewLine        if (WordCount < 1)Di2015NewLine            return string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var lineBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var lineWriter = new StringWriter(lineBuilder))Di2015NewLine        using (var xmlWriter = new XmlTextWriter(lineWriter)) {Di2015NewLine            var firstWord = _words[0];Di2015NewLine            foreach (var node in firstWord.NodeStack) {Di2015NewLine                xmlWriter.WriteStartElement(node.Name);Di2015NewLine                foreach (var attr in node.Attributes)Di2015NewLine                    xmlWriter.WriteAttributeString(attr.Name, attr.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            xmlWriter.WriteString(firstWord.Text + " ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i < WordCount; ++i) {Di2015NewLine                var previousWord = _words[i - 1];Di2015NewLine                var word = _words[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                HtmlNode[] droppedNodes;Di2015NewLine                HtmlNode[] addedNodes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                CompareNodeStacks(Di2015NewLine                    previousWord,Di2015NewLine                    word,Di2015NewLine                    out droppedNodes,Di2015NewLine                    out addedNodesDi2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var dropped in droppedNodes)Di2015NewLine                    xmlWriter.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var added in addedNodes) {Di2015NewLine                    xmlWriter.WriteStartElement(added.Name);Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var attr in added.Attributes)Di2015NewLine                        xmlWriter.WriteAttributeString(attr.Name, attr.Value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                xmlWriter.WriteString(word.Text + " ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (i == _words.Count - 1) {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var node in word.NodeStack)Di2015NewLine                        xmlWriter.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return lineBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2750273Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing HtmlAgilityPack;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class HtmlHelper {Di2015NewLine    public static IList<HtmlLine> SplitIntoLines(this HtmlNode node, int wordsPerLine) {Di2015NewLine        var lines = new List<HtmlLine>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var words = node.GetWords(node.ParentNode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < words.Count; i += wordsPerLine) {Di2015NewLine            lines.Add(new HtmlLine(words.Skip(i).Take(wordsPerLine)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return lines.AsReadOnly();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IList<HtmlWord> GetWords(this HtmlNode node, HtmlNode top) {Di2015NewLine        var words = new List<HtmlWord>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (node.HasChildNodes) {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var child in node.ChildNodes)Di2015NewLine                words.AddRange(child.GetWords(top));Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            var textNode = node as HtmlTextNode;Di2015NewLine            if (textNode != null && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(textNode.Text)) {Di2015NewLine                string[] singleWords = textNode.Text.Split(Di2015NewLine                    new string[] {" "},Di2015NewLine                    StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntriesDi2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine                words.AddRange(Di2015NewLine                    singleWordsDi2015NewLine                        .Select(w => new HtmlWord(w, node.ParentNode, top)Di2015NewLine                    )Di2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return words.AsReadOnly();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2757570Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegex arrayRegex = new Regex(@"Array[ \\t]*\\((.+)\\)");Di2015NewLineRegex rowRegex = new Regex(@"\\[([^\\]]+)\\] => Array \\( ([^)]+)[ \\t]*\\)");Di2015NewLineRegex entryRegex = new Regex(@"\\[([^\\]]+)\\] => ([^\\]\\[]+)");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar rows = new List<SortedDictionary<string,string>>();Di2015NewLinevar matches = arrayRegex.Matches(textToParse);Di2015NewLineforeach (Match match in matches)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (match.Groups.Count != 2)Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Invalid array");Di2015NewLine    var rowsMactches = rowRegex.Matches(match.Groups[1].Value);Di2015NewLine    foreach (Match rowMatch in rowsMactches)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rowDict = new SortedDictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine        if (rowMatch.Groups.Count != 3)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Invalid row");Di2015NewLine        var entryMatches = entryRegex.Matches(rowMatch.Groups[2].Value);Di2015NewLine        foreach (Match entryMatch in entryMatches)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (entryMatch.Groups.Count != 3)Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Invalid entry");Di2015NewLine            string key = entryMatch.Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLine            string val = entryMatch.Groups[2].Value;Di2015NewLine            rowDict.Add(key, val);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        rows.Add(rowDict);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// use the first row to build the columns (N.B. we suppose all dictionaries have the same keys)Di2015NewLinevar firstRow = rows.First();Di2015NewLineDataTable dt = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineforeach (string colName in firstRow.Keys)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add(colName);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineforeach (var row in rows)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    dt.Rows.Add(row.Values.Cast<object>().ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2760111Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Ref<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Func<T> getter;Di2015NewLine    private Action<T> setter;Di2015NewLine    public Ref(Func<T> getter, Action<T> setter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.getter = getter;Di2015NewLine        this.setter = setter;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public T ValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return getter(); }Di2015NewLine        set { setter(value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineint abc = 123;Di2015NewLinevar refabc = new Ref<int>(()=>abc, x=>{abc=x;});Di2015NewLine... now you can pass around refabc, store it in a field, and so onDi2015NewLinerefabc.Value = 456;Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(abc); // 456Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(refabc.Value); // 456Di2015NewLine
2760459Di2015UniqueSeparatorIBidirectionalGraph<int, IEdge<int>> CreateGraph(int vertexCount)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    BidirectionalGraph<int, IEdge<int>> graph = new BidirectionalGraph<int, IEdge<int>>(true);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < vertexCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        graph.AddVertex(i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < vertexCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        graph.AddEdge(new Edge<int>(i - 1, i));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return graph;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic public void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IBidirectionalGraph<int, IEdge<int>> graph = CreateGraph(5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var dfs = new DepthFirstSearchAlgorithm<int, IEdge<int>>(graph);            Di2015NewLine    var observer = new VertexPredecessorRecorderObserver<int, IEdge<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (observer.Attach(dfs)) // attach, detach to dfs eventsDi2015NewLine        dfs.Compute();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int vertexToFind = 3;Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<IEdge<int>> edges;Di2015NewLine    if (observer.TryGetPath(vertexToFind, out edges))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("To get to vertex '" + vertexToFind + "', take the following edges:");Di2015NewLine        foreach (IEdge<int> edge in edges)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(edge.Source + " -> " + edge.Target);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
