2765934Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing NUnit.Framework;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Salient.ExcerptsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [TestFixture]Di2015NewLine    public class WebHostServerFixture : WebHostServerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [TestFixtureSetUp]Di2015NewLine        public void TestFixtureSetUp()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // debug/bin/testproject/solution/siteundertest - make sense?Di2015NewLine            StartServer(@"..\\..\\..\\..\\TestSite");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // is the equivalent ofDi2015NewLine            // StartServer(@"..\\..\\..\\..\\TestSite",Di2015NewLine            // GetAvailablePort(8000, 10000, IPAddress.Loopback, true), "/", "localhost");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        [TestFixtureTearDown]Di2015NewLine        public void TestFixtureTearDown()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StopServer();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [Test]Di2015NewLine        public void Test()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // while a reference to the web app under test is not necessary,Di2015NewLine            // if you do add a reference to this test project you may F5 debug your tests.Di2015NewLine            // if you debug this test you will break in Default.aspx.csDi2015NewLine            string html = new WebClient().DownloadString(NormalizeUri("Default.aspx"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2765934Di2015UniqueSeparator// Project: SalientDi2015NewLine// http://salient.codeplex.comDi2015NewLine// Date: April 16 2010Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Globalization;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.NetworkInformation;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.VisualStudio.WebHost;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Salient.ExcerptsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A general purpose Microsoft.VisualStudio.WebHost.Server test fixture.Di2015NewLine    /// WebHost.Server is the core of the Visual Studio Development Server (WebDev.WebServer).Di2015NewLine    ///Di2015NewLine    /// This server is run in-process and may be used in F5 debugging.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// If you are adding this source code to a new project, You will need toDi2015NewLine    /// manually add a reference to WebDev.WebHost.dll to your project. It cannotDi2015NewLine    /// be added from within Visual Studio.Di2015NewLine    ///Di2015NewLine    /// Please see the Readme.txt accompanying this code for details.Di2015NewLine    /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// NOTE: code from various namespaces/classes in the Salient project have been merged into thisDi2015NewLine    /// single class for this post in the interest of brevityDi2015NewLine    public class WebHostServerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Server _server;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string ApplicationPath { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string HostName { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Port { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string VirtualPath { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string RootUrlDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return string.Format(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, "http://{0}:{1}{2}", HostName, Port, VirtualPath); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Combine the RootUrl of the running web application with the relative url specified.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public virtual Uri NormalizeUri(string relativeUrl)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new Uri(RootUrl + relativeUrl);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Will start "localhost" on first available port in the range 8000-10000 with vpath "/"Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="applicationPath"></param>Di2015NewLine        public void StartServer(string applicationPath)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StartServer(applicationPath, GetAvailablePort(8000, 10000, IPAddress.Loopback, true), "/", "localhost");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="applicationPath">Physical path to application.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="port">Port to listen on.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="virtualPath">Optional. defaults to "/"</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="hostName">Optional. Is used to construct RootUrl. Defaults to "localhost"</param>Di2015NewLine        public void StartServer(string applicationPath, int port, string virtualPath, string hostName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_server != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Server already started");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // WebHost.Server will not run on any other IPDi2015NewLine            IPAddress ipAddress = IPAddress.Loopback;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(!IsPortAvailable(ipAddress, port))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception(string.Format("Port {0} is in use.", port));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            applicationPath = Path.GetFullPath(applicationPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            virtualPath = String.Format("/{0}/", (virtualPath ?? string.Empty).Trim('/')).Replace("//", "/");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _server = new Server(port, virtualPath, applicationPath, false, false);Di2015NewLine            _server.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ApplicationPath = applicationPath;Di2015NewLine            Port = port;Di2015NewLine            VirtualPath = virtualPath;Di2015NewLine            HostName = string.IsNullOrEmpty(hostName) ? "localhost" : hostName;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Stops the server.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public void StopServer()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_server != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _server.Stop();Di2015NewLine                _server = null;Di2015NewLine                // allow some time to release the portDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StopServer();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gently polls specified IP:Port to determine if it is available.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="ipAddress"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="port"></param>Di2015NewLine        public static bool IsPortAvailable(IPAddress ipAddress, int port)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool portAvailable = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                portAvailable = GetAvailablePort(port, port, ipAddress, true) == port;Di2015NewLine                if (portAvailable)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // be a little patient and wait for the port if necessary,Di2015NewLine                // the previous occupant may have just vacatedDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return portAvailable;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns first available port on the specified IP address.Di2015NewLine        /// The port scan excludes ports that are open on ANY loopback adapter.Di2015NewLine        ///Di2015NewLine        /// If the address upon which a port is requested is an 'ANY' address allDi2015NewLine        /// ports that are open on ANY IP are excluded.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="rangeStart"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="rangeEnd"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="ip">The IP address upon which to search for available port.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="includeIdlePorts">If true includes ports in TIME_WAIT state in results.Di2015NewLine        /// TIME_WAIT state is typically cool down period for recently released ports.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static int GetAvailablePort(int rangeStart, int rangeEnd, IPAddress ip, bool includeIdlePorts)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IPGlobalProperties ipProps = IPGlobalProperties.GetIPGlobalProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if the ip we want a port on is an 'any' or loopback port we need to exclude all ports that are active on any IPDi2015NewLine            Func<IPAddress, bool> isIpAnyOrLoopBack = i => IPAddress.Any.Equals(i) ||Di2015NewLine                                                           IPAddress.IPv6Any.Equals(i) ||Di2015NewLine                                                           IPAddress.Loopback.Equals(i) ||Di2015NewLine                                                           IPAddress.IPv6Loopback.Di2015NewLine                                                               Equals(i);Di2015NewLine            // get all active ports on specified IP.Di2015NewLine            List<ushort> excludedPorts = new List<ushort>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if a port is open on an 'any' or 'loopback' interface then include it in the excludedPortsDi2015NewLine            excludedPorts.AddRange(from n in ipProps.GetActiveTcpConnections()Di2015NewLine                                   whereDi2015NewLine                                       n.LocalEndPoint.Port >= rangeStart &&Di2015NewLine                                       n.LocalEndPoint.Port <= rangeEnd && (Di2015NewLine                                       isIpAnyOrLoopBack(ip) || n.LocalEndPoint.Address.Equals(ip) ||Di2015NewLine                                        isIpAnyOrLoopBack(n.LocalEndPoint.Address)) &&Di2015NewLine                                        (!includeIdlePorts || n.State != TcpState.TimeWait)Di2015NewLine                                   select (ushort)n.LocalEndPoint.Port);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            excludedPorts.AddRange(from n in ipProps.GetActiveTcpListeners()Di2015NewLine                                   where n.Port >= rangeStart && n.Port <= rangeEnd && (Di2015NewLine                                   isIpAnyOrLoopBack(ip) || n.Address.Equals(ip) || isIpAnyOrLoopBack(n.Address))Di2015NewLine                                   select (ushort)n.Port);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            excludedPorts.AddRange(from n in ipProps.GetActiveUdpListeners()Di2015NewLine                                   where n.Port >= rangeStart && n.Port <= rangeEnd && (Di2015NewLine                                   isIpAnyOrLoopBack(ip) || n.Address.Equals(ip) || isIpAnyOrLoopBack(n.Address))Di2015NewLine                                   select (ushort)n.Port);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            excludedPorts.Sort();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int port = rangeStart; port <= rangeEnd; port++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!excludedPorts.Contains((ushort)port))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return port;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2766529Di2015UniqueSeparator// utility method to recursively find controls matching a predicateDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<Control> FindRecursive( Control c, Func<Control,bool> predicate )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if( predicate( c ) )Di2015NewLine        yield return c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach( var child in c.Controls )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if( predicate( c ) )Di2015NewLine            yield return c;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach( var child in c.Controls )Di2015NewLine        foreach( var match in FindRecursive( c, predicate ) )Di2015NewLine           yield return match;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// use the utility method to find matching controls...Di2015NewLineFindRecursive( Page, c => (c is WebControl) && Di2015NewLine                          ((WebControl)c).CssClass == "instructions" );Di2015NewLine

2767338Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> MergePreserveOrder3<T, TOrder>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> aa,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, TOrder> orderFunc)Di2015NewLinewhere TOrder : IComparable<TOrder>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var items = aa.Select(xx => xx.GetEnumerator()).Where(ee => ee.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        .OrderBy(ee => orderFunc(ee.Current)).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (items.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return items[0].Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var next = items[0];Di2015NewLine        items.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLine        if (next.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // simple sorted linear insertDi2015NewLine            var value = orderFunc(next.Current);Di2015NewLine            var ii = 0;Di2015NewLine            for ( ; ii < items.Count; ++ii)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (value.CompareTo(orderFunc(items[ii].Current)) <= 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    items.Insert(ii, next);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ii == items.Count) items.Add(next);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else next.Dispose(); // woops! can't forget IDisposableDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2767338Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor (int p = 0; p < people.Count; ++p)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("List {0}:", p + 1);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("\\t{0}", String.Join(", ", people[p].Select(x => x.Name)));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Merged:");Di2015NewLineforeach (var person in people.MergePreserveOrder(pp => pp.Age))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("\\t{0}", person.Name);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList 1:Di2015NewLine        8yo, 22yo, 47yo, 49yoDi2015NewLineList 2:Di2015NewLine        35yo, 47yo, 60yoDi2015NewLineList 3:Di2015NewLine        28yo, 55yo, 64yoDi2015NewLineMerged:Di2015NewLine        8yoDi2015NewLine        22yoDi2015NewLine        28yoDi2015NewLine        35yoDi2015NewLine        47yoDi2015NewLine        47yoDi2015NewLine        49yoDi2015NewLine        55yoDi2015NewLine        60yoDi2015NewLine        64yoDi2015NewLine
2767338Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> MergePreserveOrder4<T, TOrder>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> aa,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, TOrder> orderFunc) where TOrder : IComparable<TOrder>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var items = aa.Select(xx => xx.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine                  .Where(ee => ee.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                  .Select(ee => Tuple.Create(orderFunc(ee.Current), ee))Di2015NewLine                  .OrderBy(ee => ee.Item1).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (items.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return items[0].Item2.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var next = items[0];Di2015NewLine        items.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLine        if (next.Item2.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var value = orderFunc(next.Item2.Current);Di2015NewLine            var ii = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (; ii < items.Count; ++ii)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (value.CompareTo(items[ii].Item1) <= 0)Di2015NewLine                {   // NB: using a tuple to minimize calls to orderFuncDi2015NewLine                    items.Insert(ii, Tuple.Create(value, next.Item2));Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ii == items.Count) items.Add(Tuple.Create(value, next.Item2));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else next.Item2.Dispose(); // woops! can't forget IDisposableDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2768107Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROCEDURE YourProcedureDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineBEGIN TRYDi2015NewLine    BEGIN TRANSACTION --SqlTransactionDi2015NewLine    DECLARE @ReturnValue intDi2015NewLine    SET @ReturnValue=NULLDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IF (DAY(GETDATE())=1 --logical errorDi2015NewLine    BEGINDi2015NewLine        SET @ReturnValue=5Di2015NewLine        RAISERROR('Error, first day of the month!',16,1) --send control to the BEGIN CATCH blockDi2015NewLine    ENDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT 1/0  --actual hard errorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    COMMIT TRANSACTION --SqlTransactionDi2015NewLine    RETURN 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEND TRYDi2015NewLineBEGIN CATCHDi2015NewLine    IF XACT_STATE()!=0Di2015NewLine    BEGINDi2015NewLine        ROLLBACK TRANSACTION --only rollback if a transaction is in progressDi2015NewLine    ENDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    --will echo back the complete original error message to the callerDi2015NewLine    --comment out if not neededDi2015NewLine    DECLARE @ErrorMessage nvarchar(400), @ErrorNumber int, @ErrorSeverity int, @ErrorState int, @ErrorLine intDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT @ErrorMessage = N'Error %d, Line %d, Message: '+ERROR_MESSAGE(),@ErrorNumber = ERROR_NUMBER(),@ErrorSeverity = ERROR_SEVERITY(),@ErrorState = ERROR_STATE(),@ErrorLine = ERROR_LINE()Di2015NewLine    RAISERROR (@ErrorMessage, @ErrorSeverity, @ErrorState, @ErrorNumber,@ErrorLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RETURN ISNULL(@ReturnValue,1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEND CATCHDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine
2768107Di2015UniqueSeparatorextra messages
2768107Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROC YourProcedureDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineDECLARE @SelfTransaction char(1)Di2015NewLineSET @SelfTransaction='N'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIF @@trancount=0Di2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine    SET @SelfTransaction='Y'Di2015NewLine    BEGIN TRANSACTION --SqlTransactionDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT 1/0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIF @@ERROR<> 0Di2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine    IF @SelfTransaction='Y'Di2015NewLine    BEGINDi2015NewLine        ROLLBACK TRANSACTION --SqlTransactionDi2015NewLine    ENDDi2015NewLine    RETURN -1 Di2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLineELSEDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine    IF @SelfTransaction='Y'Di2015NewLine    BEGINDi2015NewLine        COMMIT TRANSACTION --SqlTransactionDi2015NewLine    ENDDi2015NewLine    RETURN 0Di2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine
2768107Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic public int CreateTransactionScope(Di2015NewLine    string connectString1, string connectString2,Di2015NewLine    string commandText1, string commandText2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Initialize the return value to zero and create a StringWriter to display results.Di2015NewLine    int returnValue = 0;Di2015NewLine    System.IO.StringWriter writer = new System.IO.StringWriter();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create the TransactionScope to execute the commands, guaranteeingDi2015NewLine        // that both commands can commit or roll back as a single unit of work.Di2015NewLine        using (TransactionScope scope = new TransactionScope())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (SqlConnection connection1 = new SqlConnection(connectString1))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Opening the connection automatically enlists it in the Di2015NewLine                // TransactionScope as a lightweight transaction.Di2015NewLine                connection1.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create the SqlCommand object and execute the first command.Di2015NewLine                SqlCommand command1 = new SqlCommand(commandText1, connection1);Di2015NewLine                returnValue = command1.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine("Rows to be affected by command1: {0}", returnValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If you get here, this means that command1 succeeded. By nestingDi2015NewLine                // the using block for connection2 inside that of connection1, youDi2015NewLine                // conserve server and network resources as connection2 is openedDi2015NewLine                // only when there is a chance that the transaction can commit.   Di2015NewLine                using (SqlConnection connection2 = new SqlConnection(connectString2))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // The transaction is escalated to a full distributedDi2015NewLine                    // transaction when connection2 is opened.Di2015NewLine                    connection2.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Execute the second command in the second database.Di2015NewLine                    returnValue = 0;Di2015NewLine                    SqlCommand command2 = new SqlCommand(commandText2, connection2);Di2015NewLine                    returnValue = command2.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteLine("Rows to be affected by command2: {0}", returnValue);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The Complete method commits the transaction. If an exception has been thrown,Di2015NewLine            // Complete is not  called and the transaction is rolled back.Di2015NewLine            scope.Complete();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (TransactionAbortedException ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine("TransactionAbortedException Message: {0}", ex.Message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (ApplicationException ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine("ApplicationException Message: {0}", ex.Message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Display messages.Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(writer.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return returnValue;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2768107Di2015UniqueSeparatorTransactionAbortedException

2769608Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine///   Resolves URIs.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <remarks>Di2015NewLine///   <para>Di2015NewLine///     The only Uri's supported are those for W3C XHTML 1.0.Di2015NewLine///   </para>Di2015NewLine/// </remarks>Di2015NewLinepublic override Uri ResolveUri(Uri baseUri, string relativeUri)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (baseUri == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (relativeUri.StartsWith("http://"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Trace("  returning {0}", relativeUri);Di2015NewLine            return new Uri(relativeUri);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // throw if Uri scheme is unknown/unhandledDi2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (relativeUri == null)Di2015NewLine        return baseUri;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // both are non-nullDi2015NewLine    var uri = baseUri.AbsoluteUri;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var key in knownDtds.Keys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // look up the URI in the table of known URIsDi2015NewLine        var dtdUriRoot = knownDtds[key];Di2015NewLine        if (uri.StartsWith(dtdUriRoot))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string newUri = uri.Substring(0,dtdUriRoot.Length) + relativeUri;Di2015NewLine            return new Uri(newUri);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // must throw if Uri is unknown/unhandledDi2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2769608Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine///   Gets the entity associated to the given Uri, role, andDi2015NewLine///   Type.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <remarks>Di2015NewLine///   <para>Di2015NewLine///     The only Type that is supported is the System.IO.Stream.Di2015NewLine///   </para>Di2015NewLine///   <para>Di2015NewLine///     The only Uri's supported are those for W3C XHTML 1.0.Di2015NewLine///   </para>Di2015NewLine/// </remarks>Di2015NewLinepublic override object GetEntity(Uri absoluteUri, string role, Type t)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // only handle streamsDi2015NewLine    if (t != typeof(System.IO.Stream))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (absoluteUri == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var uri = absoluteUri.AbsoluteUri;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var key in knownDtds.Keys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (uri.StartsWith(knownDtds[key]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Return the stream containing the requested DTD. Di2015NewLine            // This can be a FileStream, HttpResponseStream, MemoryStream, Di2015NewLine            // or whatever other stream you like.  I used a Resource streamDi2015NewLine            // myself.  If you retrieve the DTDs via HTTP, you could use yourDi2015NewLine            // own IWebProxy here.  Di2015NewLine            var resourceName = GetResourceName(key, uri.Substring(knownDtds[key].Length));Di2015NewLine            return GetStreamForNamedResource(resourceName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2771310Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static String SearchFileRecursive(String baseFolderPath, String fileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Returns, if found, the full path of the file; otherwise returns null.Di2015NewLine        var response = Path.Combine(baseFolderPath, fileName);Di2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(response))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return response;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Recursion.Di2015NewLine        var directories = Directory.GetDirectories(baseFolderPath);Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < directories.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            response = SearchFileRecursive(directories[i], fileName);Di2015NewLine            if (response != null) return response;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // { file was not found }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2771892Di2015UniqueSeparator   public bool inPoly(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i, j = hull.Count - 1;Di2015NewLine        var oddNodes = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (i = 0; i < hull.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (hull[i].Y < y && hull[j].Y >= yDi2015NewLine                || hull[j].Y < y && hull[i].Y >= y)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var delta = (hull[j].X - hull[i].X);Di2015NewLine                if (delta == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (0 < x) oddNodes = !oddNodes;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (hull[i].X + (y - hull[i].X) / delta * delta < x)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    oddNodes = !oddNodes;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            j = i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return oddNodes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2776771Di2015UniqueSeparator// Open source fileDi2015NewLinehSrcFile = CreateFile (pszSrcFilename, GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ, NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, 0, NULL);Di2015NewLineif (hSrcFile == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)Di2015NewLine    __leave;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Map the source file in memoryDi2015NewLinehMapSrcFile = CreateFileMapping (hSrcFile, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, 0, 0, NULL);    // SEC_IMAGEDi2015NewLineif (!hMapSrcFile || hMapSrcFile == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)Di2015NewLine    __leave;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Map the entire of the source file is memoryDi2015NewLinepSrcFile = (PBYTE) MapViewOfFile (hMapSrcFile, FILE_MAP_READ, 0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLineif (!pSrcFile)Di2015NewLine    __leave;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepDosHeader = (IMAGE_DOS_HEADER *)pSrcFile;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (pDosHeader->e_magic != IMAGE_DOS_SIGNATURE) {Di2015NewLine    printf ("it is not a EXE file.\\n");Di2015NewLine    return 1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprintf ("IMAGE_DOS_HEADER size %d (0x%X) bytes\\n",  sizeof(IMAGE_DOS_HEADER), sizeof(IMAGE_DOS_HEADER));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDumpDosHeader (pDosHeader);Di2015NewLinepDosExeStart = (PBYTE)pDosHeader + pDosHeader->e_cparhdr*16;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (g_bDump)Di2015NewLine    HexDump (1, pDosExeStart, pDosHeader->e_lfanew - pDosHeader->e_cparhdr*16, (DWORD)pDosExeStart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (pDosHeader->e_lfanew) {Di2015NewLine    IMAGE_NT_HEADERS32 *pNtHeader = (IMAGE_NT_HEADERS32 *)((PBYTE)pDosHeader + pDosHeader->e_lfanew);Di2015NewLine    //IMAGE_NT_HEADERS64 *pNtHeader64 = (IMAGE_NT_HEADERS64 *)((PBYTE)pDosHeader + pDosHeader->e_lfanew);Di2015NewLine    IMAGE_SECTION_HEADER *pFirstSectionHeader = (IMAGE_SECTION_HEADER *)((PBYTE)&pNtHeader->OptionalHeader +Di2015NewLine                                                                            pNtHeader->FileHeader.SizeOfOptionalHeader);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (pNtHeader->Signature == IMAGE_NT_SIGNATURE) {Di2015NewLine        int i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        printf ("\\nPE signature\\n");Di2015NewLine        printf ("\\nIMAGE_FILE_HEADER: size %d (0x%X) bytes, offset from the begin of the file: %d (0x%X)\\n",Di2015NewLine                sizeof(IMAGE_FILE_HEADER), sizeof(IMAGE_FILE_HEADER),Di2015NewLine                ((PBYTE)&pNtHeader->FileHeader - (PBYTE)pDosHeader), ((PBYTE)&pNtHeader->FileHeader - (PBYTE)pDosHeader));Di2015NewLine        DumpFileHeader (1, &pNtHeader->FileHeader);Di2015NewLine        switch (pNtHeader->OptionalHeader.Magic) {Di2015NewLine            case IMAGE_NT_OPTIONAL_HDR32_MAGIC:Di2015NewLine                printf ("\\nIMAGE_OPTIONAL_HEADER32: size %d (0x%X) bytes, offset from the begin of the file: %d (0x%X)\\n",Di2015NewLine                        sizeof(IMAGE_OPTIONAL_HEADER32), sizeof(IMAGE_OPTIONAL_HEADER32),Di2015NewLine                        ((PBYTE)&pNtHeader->OptionalHeader - (PBYTE)pDosHeader), ((PBYTE)&pNtHeader->OptionalHeader - (PBYTE)pDosHeader));Di2015NewLine                DumpOptionalHeader32 (1, &pNtHeader->OptionalHeader);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case IMAGE_NT_OPTIONAL_HDR64_MAGIC:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case IMAGE_ROM_OPTIONAL_HDR_MAGIC:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

                input.Text = "";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Key.Escape:Di2015NewLine                    input.Text = "";Di2015NewLine 2780027Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string DecryptTextFromMemory(byte[] Data, byte[] Key, byte[] IV)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create a new MemoryStream using the passedDi2015NewLine        // array of encrypted data.Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream msDecrypt = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a CryptoStream using the MemoryStreamDi2015NewLine        // and the passed key and initialization vector (IV).Di2015NewLine        CryptoStream csDecrypt = new CryptoStream(msDecrypt,Di2015NewLine        new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider().CreateDecryptor(Key, IV),Di2015NewLine        CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        csDecrypt.Write(Data, 0, Data.Length);Di2015NewLine        csDecrypt.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine        msDecrypt.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create buffer to hold the decrypted data.Di2015NewLine        byte[] fromEncrypt = new byte[msDecrypt.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Read the decrypted data out of the crypto streamDi2015NewLine        // and place it into the temporary buffer.Di2015NewLine        msDecrypt.Read(fromEncrypt, 0, msDecrypt.ToArray().Length);Di2015NewLine        csDecrypt.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Convert the buffer into a string and return it.Di2015NewLine        return new UTF8Encoding().GetString(fromEncrypt);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (CryptographicException e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("A Cryptographic error occurred: {0}", e.Message);Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2780406Di2015UniqueSeparatorAuthorize
2780406Di2015UniqueSeparator[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Class | AttributeTargets.Method, Inherited = true, AllowMultiple = false)]Di2015NewLinepublic class MyAuthorizationAttribute : AuthorizeAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The name of the master page or view to use when rendering the view on authorization failure.  DefaultDi2015NewLine    /// is null, indicating to use the master page of the specified view.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public virtual string MasterName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The name of the view to render on authorization failure.  Default is "Error".Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public virtual string ViewName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyAuthorizationAttribute ()Di2015NewLine        : base()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.ViewName = "Error";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void CacheValidateHandler(HttpContext context, object data, ref HttpValidationStatus validationStatus)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        validationStatus = OnCacheAuthorization(new HttpContextWrapper(context));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void OnAuthorization(AuthorizationContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (filterContext == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("filterContext");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (AuthorizeCore(filterContext.HttpContext))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SetCachePolicy(filterContext);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (!filterContext.HttpContext.User.Identity.IsAuthenticated)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // auth failed, redirect to login pageDi2015NewLine            filterContext.Result = new HttpUnauthorizedResult();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (filterContext.HttpContext.User.IsInRole("SuperUser"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // is authenticated and is in the SuperUser roleDi2015NewLine            SetCachePolicy(filterContext);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ViewDataDictionary viewData = new ViewDataDictionary();Di2015NewLine            viewData.Add("Message", "You do not have sufficient privileges for this operation.");Di2015NewLine            filterContext.Result = new ViewResult { MasterName = this.MasterName, ViewName = this.ViewName, ViewData = viewData };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void SetCachePolicy(AuthorizationContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // ** IMPORTANT **Di2015NewLine        // Since we're performing authorization at the action level, the authorization code runsDi2015NewLine        // after the output caching module. In the worst case this could allow an authorized userDi2015NewLine        // to cause the page to be cached, then an unauthorized user would later be served theDi2015NewLine        // cached page. We work around this by telling proxies not to cache the sensitive page,Di2015NewLine        // then we hook our custom authorization code into the caching mechanism so that we haveDi2015NewLine        // the final say on whether a page should be served from the cache.Di2015NewLine        HttpCachePolicyBase cachePolicy = filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Cache;Di2015NewLine        cachePolicy.SetProxyMaxAge(new TimeSpan(0));Di2015NewLine        cachePolicy.AddValidationCallback(CacheValidateHandler, null /* data */);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2784049Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass AuthInfoValidator : AbstractValidator<AuthInfo>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public AuthInfoValidator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RuleFor(x => x.Username)Di2015NewLine            .NotEmpty()Di2015NewLine            .WithMessage("Username is required");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RuleFor(x => x.Password)Di2015NewLine            .NotEmpty()Di2015NewLine            .WithMessage("Password is required");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RuleFor(x => x.ConfirmPassword)Di2015NewLine            .NotEmpty()Di2015NewLine            .WithMessage("ConfirmPassword is required");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RuleFor(x => x.ConfirmPassword)Di2015NewLine            .Equal(x => x.Password)Di2015NewLine            .WithMessage("Passwords must match");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2789606Di2015UniqueSeparatorMemberExpression
2789606Di2015UniqueSeparatorTryFindMemberExpression
2789606Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetFullPropertyName
2789606Di2015UniqueSeparator// code adjusted to prevent horizontal overflowDi2015NewLinestatic string GetFullPropertyName<T, TProperty>Di2015NewLine(Expression<Func<T, TProperty>> exp)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MemberExpression memberExp;Di2015NewLine    if (!TryFindMemberExpression(exp.Body, out memberExp))Di2015NewLine        return string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var memberNames = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        memberNames.Push(memberExp.Member.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (TryFindMemberExpression(memberExp.Expression, out memberExp));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return string.Join(".", memberNames.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// code adjusted to prevent horizontal overflowDi2015NewLineprivate static bool TryFindMemberExpressionDi2015NewLine(Expression exp, out MemberExpression memberExp)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    memberExp = exp as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine    if (memberExp != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // heyo! that was easy enoughDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if the compiler created an automatic conversion,Di2015NewLine    // it'll look something like...Di2015NewLine    // obj => Convert(obj.Property) [e.g., int -> object]Di2015NewLine    // OR:Di2015NewLine    // obj => ConvertChecked(obj.Property) [e.g., int -> long]Di2015NewLine    // ...which are the cases checked in IsConversionDi2015NewLine    if (IsConversion(exp) && exp is UnaryExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        memberExp = ((UnaryExpression)exp).Operand as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (memberExp != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool IsConversion(Expression exp)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (Di2015NewLine        exp.NodeType == ExpressionType.Convert ||Di2015NewLine        exp.NodeType == ExpressionType.ConvertCheckedDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2791281Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void QuoteString(this string value, StringBuilder b) {Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(value))Di2015NewLine        return "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var b = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    int startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < value.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        char c = value[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Append the unhandled characters (that do not require special treament)Di2015NewLine        // to the string builder when special characters are detected.Di2015NewLine        if (c == '\\r' || c == '\\t' || c == '\\"' || c == '\\'' || c == '<' || c == '>' ||Di2015NewLine            c == '\\\\' || c == '\\n' || c == '\\b' || c == '\\f' || c < ' ') {Di2015NewLine            if (b == null) {Di2015NewLine                b = new StringBuilder(value.Length + 5);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (count > 0) {Di2015NewLine                b.Append(value, startIndex, count);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            startIndex = i + 1;Di2015NewLine            count = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (c) {Di2015NewLine            case '\\r':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\r");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\t':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\t");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\"':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\\\"");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\\\':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\\\\\");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\n':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\n");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\b':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\b");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\f':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\f");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\'':Di2015NewLine            case '>':Di2015NewLine            case '<':Di2015NewLine                AppendCharAsUnicode(b, c);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                if (c < ' ') {Di2015NewLine                    AppendCharAsUnicode(b, c);Di2015NewLine                } else {Di2015NewLine                    count++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (b == null) {Di2015NewLine        b.Append(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (count > 0) {Di2015NewLine        b.Append(value, startIndex, count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return b.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2798385Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic long ComputeCRC(byte[] val)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long crc;Di2015NewLine    long q;Di2015NewLine    byte c;Di2015NewLine    crc = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < val.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        c = val[i];Di2015NewLine        q = (crc ^ c) & 0x0f;Di2015NewLine        crc = (crc >> 4) ^ (q * 0x1081);Di2015NewLine        q = (crc ^ (c >> 4)) & 0xf;Di2015NewLine        crc = (crc >> 4) ^ (q * 0x1081);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (byte)crc << 8 | (byte)(crc >> 8);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2802278Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool PropertiesEqual<T>(T object1, T object2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyDescriptorCollection object2Properties = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(object1);Di2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyDescriptor object1Property in TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(object2))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PropertyDescriptor object2Property = object2Properties.Find(object1Property.Name, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (object2Property != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    object object1Value = object1Property.GetValue(object1);Di2015NewLine                    object object2Value = object2Property.GetValue(object2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if ((object1Value == null && object2Value != null) || (object1Value != null && object2Value == null))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (object1Value != null && object2Value != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (!object1Value.Equals(object2Value))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            return false;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

2803812Di2015UniqueSeparatornet use h: \\\\MACHINE1 <password> /user:<domain>\\<user>Di2015NewLinenet use i: \\\\MACHINE2 <password> /user:<domain>\\<user>Di2015NewLinenet use j: \\\\MACHINE3 <password> /user:<domain>\\<user>Di2015NewLine
2803833Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] Compress(byte[, ,] uncompressed)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (uncompressed == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("uncompressed", Di2015NewLine                                        "The given array is null!");Di2015NewLine    if (uncompressed.LongLength > (long)int.MaxValue)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("The given array is to large!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    using (GZipStream gzs = new GZipStream(ms, CompressionMode.Compress))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Save sizes of the dimensionsDi2015NewLine        for (int dim = 0; dim < 3; dim++)Di2015NewLine            gzs.Write(BitConverter.GetBytes(Di2015NewLine                      uncompressed.GetLength(dim)), 0, sizeof(int));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert byte[,,] to byte[] by just blockcopying itDi2015NewLine        // I know, some pointer-magic/unmanaged cast wouldnt Di2015NewLine        // have to copy it, but its cleaner this way...Di2015NewLine        byte[] data = new byte[uncompressed.Length];Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(uncompressed, 0, data, 0, uncompressed.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Write the data to the stream to compress itDi2015NewLine        gzs.Write(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine        gzs.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the compressed byte array backDi2015NewLine        return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2803833Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[, ,] Decompress(byte[] compressed)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (compressed == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("compressed", Di2015NewLine                                        "Data to decompress cant be null!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream(compressed))Di2015NewLine    using (GZipStream gzs = new GZipStream(ms, CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Read the header and restore sizes of dimensionsDi2015NewLine        byte[] dimheader = new byte[sizeof(int) * 3];Di2015NewLine        gzs.Read(dimheader, 0, dimheader.Length);Di2015NewLine        int[] dims = new int[3];Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++)Di2015NewLine            dims[j] = BitConverter.ToInt32(dimheader, sizeof(int) * j);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Read the data into a bufferDi2015NewLine        byte[] data = new byte[dims[0] * dims[1] * dims[2]];Di2015NewLine        gzs.Read(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy the buffer to the three-dimensional arrayDi2015NewLine        byte[, ,] uncompressed = new byte[dims[0], dims[1], dims[2]];Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(data, 0, uncompressed, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return uncompressed;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2803833Di2015UniqueSeparatorRandom rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create a new randomly big array, fill it with random dataDi2015NewLinebyte[, ,] uncomp = new byte[rnd.Next(70, 100), Di2015NewLine                       rnd.Next(70, 100), rnd.Next(70, 100)];Di2015NewLinefor (int x = 0; x < uncomp.GetLength(0); x++)Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < uncomp.GetLength(1); y++)Di2015NewLine        for (int z = 0; z < uncomp.GetLength(2); z++)Di2015NewLine            uncomp[x, y, z] = (byte)rnd.Next(30, 35);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Compress and Uncompress againDi2015NewLineStopwatch compTime = new Stopwatch(), uncompTime = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLinecompTime.Start();Di2015NewLinebyte[] comp = Compress(uncomp);Di2015NewLinecompTime.Stop();Di2015NewLineuncompTime.Start();Di2015NewLinebyte[, ,] uncompagain = Decompress(comp);Di2015NewLineuncompTime.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Assert all dimension lengths and contents are equalDi2015NewLinefor (int j = 0; j < 3; j++)Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(uncomp.GetLength(j) == uncompagain.GetLength(j));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int x = 0; x < uncomp.GetLength(0); x++)Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < uncomp.GetLength(1); y++)Di2015NewLine        for (int z = 0; z < uncomp.GetLength(2); z++)Di2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(uncomp[x, y, z] == uncompagain[x, y, z]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(string.Format("Compression: {0}ms, " +Di2015NewLine    "Decompression: {1}ms, Ratio: {2}% ({3}/{4} bytes)",Di2015NewLine    compTime.ElapsedMilliseconds, uncompTime.ElapsedMilliseconds,Di2015NewLine    (int)((double)comp.LongLength / (double)uncomp.LongLength * 100),Di2015NewLine    comp.LongLength, uncomp.LongLength));Di2015NewLine
2803833Di2015UniqueSeparatorCompression: 77ms, Decompression: 23ms, Ratio: 41% (191882/461538 bytes)Di2015NewLine

2806935Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct PricePointDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ulong price;Di2015NewLine    ulong volume;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic struct RangePointDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ulong open;Di2015NewLine    ulong close;Di2015NewLine    ulong volume;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<RangePoint> calculateRanges(IEnumerable<PricePoint> pricePoints)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (pricePoints.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ulong open = pricePoints.First().price;Di2015NewLine        ulong volume = pricePoints.First().volume;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach(PricePoint pricePoint in pricePoints.Skip(1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            volume += pricePoint.volume;Di2015NewLine            if (pricePoint.price > open)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if ((pricePoint.price - open) >= STEP)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // We have established a up-trend.Di2015NewLine                    RangePoint rangePoint;Di2015NewLine                    rangePoint.open = open;Di2015NewLine                    rangePoint.close = close;Di2015NewLine                    rangePoint.volume = volume;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    open = pricePoint.price;Di2015NewLine                    volume = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    yield return rangePoint;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if ((open - pricePoint.price) >= REVERSAL_STEP)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // We have established a reversal.Di2015NewLine                    RangePoint rangePoint;Di2015NewLine                    rangePoint.open = open;Di2015NewLine                    rangePoint.close = pricePoint.price;Di2015NewLine                    rangePoint.volume = volume;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    open = pricePoint.price;Di2015NewLine                    volume = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    yield return rangePoint;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RangePoint lastPoint;Di2015NewLine        lastPoint.open = open;Di2015NewLine        lastPoint.close = pricePoints.Last().price;Di2015NewLine        lastPoint.volume = volume;Di2015NewLine        yield return lastPoint;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2807583Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class StringExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string[] SplitQuoted(this string input, char separator, char quotechar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> tokens = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        bool escaped = false;Di2015NewLine        foreach (char c in input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (c.Equals(separator) && !escaped)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // we have a tokenDi2015NewLine                tokens.Add(sb.ToString().Trim());Di2015NewLine                sb.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (c.Equals(separator) && escaped)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // ignore but add to stringDi2015NewLine                sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (c.Equals(quotechar))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                escaped = !escaped;Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        tokens.Add(sb.ToString().Trim());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return tokens.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2810659Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const string InputFileName = @"input.txt";Di2015NewLine            const string OutputFileName = @"output.txt";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<Line> parsedLineList = new List<Line>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(InputFileName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string inputLine;Di2015NewLine                int lineNum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while ((inputLine = sr.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    lineNum++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Line parsedLine = new Line(inputLine);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (parsedLine.IsMatch)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        parsedLineList.Add(parsedLine);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Debug.WriteLine("Line {0} did not match pattern {1}", lineNum, inputLine);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(OutputFileName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (Line line in parsedLineList)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sw.WriteLine(line.ToString());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2810659Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace FragmentsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class LineDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly static Regex Pattern =Di2015NewLine            new Regex(@"^(?<X>X[^Y]+?)(?<Y>Y[^Z]+?)(?<Z>Z[^G]+?)(?<G>G[^H]+?)(?<H>H[^E]+?)(?<E>E[^$])$");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public readonly string OriginalText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string TextDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return this.X.ToString() + this.Y.ToString() + this.G54.ToString() + this.G.ToString() + this.T.ToString() + Environment.NewLine +Di2015NewLine                       this.G43.ToString() + this.Z.ToString() + this.H.ToString() + this.M08.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public readonly bool IsMatch;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Fragment X { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public Fragment Y { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public readonly Fragment G54 = new Fragment("G54");Di2015NewLine        public Fragment G { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public Fragment T { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public readonly Fragment G43 = new Fragment("G43");Di2015NewLine        public Fragment Z { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public Fragment H { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public readonly Fragment M08 = new Fragment("M08");Di2015NewLine        public Fragment E { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Line(string text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.OriginalText = text;Di2015NewLine            Match match = Line.Pattern.Match(text);Di2015NewLine            this.IsMatch = match.Success;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.X = new Fragment(match.Groups["X"].Value);Di2015NewLine                this.Y = new Fragment(match.Groups["Y"].Value);Di2015NewLine                this.G = new Fragment(match.Groups["G"].Value);Di2015NewLine                this.Z = new Fragment(match.Groups["Z"].Value);Di2015NewLine                this.H = new Fragment(match.Groups["H"].Value);Di2015NewLine                this.E = new Fragment(match.Groups["E"].Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                this.T = new Fragment('T', this.H.Number + 1.0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.Text;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2810659Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace FragmentsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class FragmentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly static Regex Pattern =Di2015NewLine            new Regex(@"^(?<Letter>[A-Z]{1})(?<Number>.+)$");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public readonly string Text;Di2015NewLine        public readonly bool IsMatch;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public readonly char Letter;Di2015NewLine        public readonly double Number;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Fragment(string text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Text = text;Di2015NewLine            Match match = Fragment.Pattern.Match(text);Di2015NewLine            this.IsMatch = match.Success;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Letter = match.Groups["Letter"].Value[0];Di2015NewLine                string possibleNumber = match.Groups["Number"].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double parsedNumber;Di2015NewLine                if (double.TryParse(possibleNumber, out parsedNumber))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.Number = parsedNumber;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Debug.WriteLine("Couldn't parse double from input {0}", possibleNumber);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine("Fragment {0} did not match fragment pattern", text);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Fragment(char letter, double number)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Letter = letter;Di2015NewLine            this.Number = number;Di2015NewLine            this.Text = letter + number.ToString();Di2015NewLine            this.IsMatch = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.Text;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2811805Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int SequenceCompare<T>(IEnumerable<T> source1, IEnumerable<T> source2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // TODO: Parameter validation :)Di2015NewLine    // You could add an overload with this as a parameterDi2015NewLine    IComparer<T> elementComparer = Comparer<T>.Default;       Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<T> iterator1 = source1.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<T> iterator2 = source2.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool next1 = iterator1.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            bool next2 = iterator2.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            if (!next1 && !next2) // Both sequences finishedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!next1) // Only the first sequence has finishedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return -1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!next2) // Only the second sequence has finishedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // Both are still going, compare current elementsDi2015NewLine            int comparison = elementComparer.Compare(iterator1.Current,Di2015NewLine                                                     iterator2.Current);Di2015NewLine            // If elements are non-equal, we're doneDi2015NewLine            if (comparison != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return comparison;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            reader.Close();Di2015NewLine            MySqlCommand cmd2 = new MySqlCommand("select Day_Name , Lesson_Time  from            cmd2.Parameters.Add(param6);Di2015NewLine            cmd2.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine            reader2 = cmd2.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine            if (reader2["Day_Name"].ToString() == "Monday" && ((int)DayOfWeek.Monday - (int)DateTime.Today.DayOfWeek) > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        nextLessonTime = }Di2015NewLine                    else if (reader2["Day_Name"].ToString() == "Tuesday" && ((int)DayOfWeek.Tuesday - (int)DateTime.Today.DayOfWeek) > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        nextLessonTime = DateTime.Parse(reader2["Lesson_Time"].ToString()).AddDays((int)DayOfWeek.Tuesday - (int)DateTime.Today.DayOfWeek);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (reader2["Day_Name"].ToString() == "Wednesday" && ((int)DayOfWeek.Wednesday - (int)DateTime.Today.DayOfWeek) > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        nextLessonTime = DateTime.Parse(reader2["Lesson_Time"].ToString()).AddDays((int)DayOfWeek.Wednesday - (int)DateTime.Today.DayOfWeek);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (reader2["Day_Name"].ToString() == "Thursday" && 2812668Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Sub CreateCSVFile(ByVal dt As DataTable, ByVal strFilePath As String)Di2015NewLine    Using sw As New StreamWriter(strFilePath)Di2015NewLine        CreateCSVFile(dt, sw)Di2015NewLine    End UsingDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Sub CreateCSVFile(ByVal dt As DataTable, ByVal outStream As TextWriter)Di2015NewLine    ''# First we will write the headers.  Di2015NewLine    Dim delimiter As String = String.EmptyDi2015NewLine    For Each col As DataColumn in dt.ColumnsDi2015NewLine         outStream.Write(delimiter)Di2015NewLine         outStream.Write(col.ColumnName)Di2015NewLine         delimiter = ","Di2015NewLine    Next col        Di2015NewLine    outStream.Write(outStream.NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   int flushCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ''# Now write all the rows. Di2015NewLine    For Each dr As DataRow In dt.RowsDi2015NewLine        delimiter = String.EmptyDi2015NewLine        For i As Integer = 0 To dt.Columns.Count -1Di2015NewLine            outStream.Write(delimiter)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            If Not Convert.IsDBNull(dr(i)) ThenDi2015NewLine                outStream.Write("""") ''#Wrap fields in quotes to allow for commas in field dataDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ''# Need to escape the quotes as wellDi2015NewLine                outStream.Write(dr(i).ToString().Replace("""", """"""))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                outStream.Write("""") Di2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine            delimiter = ","Di2015NewLine        Next iDi2015NewLine        outStream.Write(outStream.NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ''# Flush the buffer periodicallyDi2015NewLine        flushCount += 1Di2015NewLine        If flushCount > 100 ThenDi2015NewLine             outStream.Flush()Di2015NewLine             flushCount = 0Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    Next drDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

2814884Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<int, bool> checkState;Di2015NewLineprivate void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    dataGridView1.AutoGenerateColumns = false;Di2015NewLine    dataGridView1.DataSource = customerOrdersBindingSource;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The check box column will be virtual.Di2015NewLine    dataGridView1.VirtualMode = true;Di2015NewLine    dataGridView1.Columns.Insert(0, new DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Initialize the dictionary that contains the boolean check state.Di2015NewLine    checkState = new Dictionary<int, bool>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate void dataGridView1_CellValueChanged(object sender, DataGridViewCellEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Update the status bar when the cell value changes.Di2015NewLine    if (e.ColumnIndex == 0 && e.RowIndex != -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get the orderID from the OrderID column.Di2015NewLine        int orderID = (int)dataGridView1.Rows[e.RowIndex].Cells["OrderID"].Value;Di2015NewLine        checkState[orderID] = (bool)dataGridView1.Rows[e.RowIndex].Cells[0].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void dataGridView1_CellValueNeeded(object sender, DataGridViewCellValueEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Handle the notification that the value for a cell in the virtual columnDi2015NewLine    // is needed. Get the value from the dictionary if the key exists.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (e.ColumnIndex == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int orderID = (int)dataGridView1.Rows[e.RowIndex].Cells["OrderID"].Value;Di2015NewLine        if (checkState.ContainsKey(orderID))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            e.Value = checkState[orderID];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            e.Value = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void dataGridView1_CellValuePushed(object sender, DataGridViewCellValueEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Handle the notification that the value for a cell in the virtual columnDi2015NewLine    // needs to be pushed back to the dictionary.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (e.ColumnIndex == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get the orderID from the OrderID column.Di2015NewLine        int orderID = (int)dataGridView1.Rows[e.RowIndex].Cells["OrderID"].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add or update the checked value to the dictionary depending on if the Di2015NewLine        // key (orderID) already exists.Di2015NewLine        if (!checkState.ContainsKey(orderID))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            checkState.Add(orderID, (bool)e.Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            checkState[orderID] = (bool)e.Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2815092Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<String> SplitString(String text, int [] lengths)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   List<String> output = new List<String>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   List<String> words = Split(text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   int i = 0;Di2015NewLine   int lineNum = 0;Di2015NewLine   string s = string.empty;Di2015NewLine   while(i<words.Length)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       if(s.Length+words[i].Length <lengths[lineNum])Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine            s+=words[i];Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine            if(lineNum<lengths.Length-1)Di2015NewLine                 lineNum++;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       elseDi2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          output.Add(s);Di2015NewLine          s=String.Empty;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    s.Remove(S.length-1,1);// deletes last extra space.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return output;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public static List<string> Split(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> result = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var letter in text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (letter != ' ' && letter != '\\t' && letter != '\\n')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(letter);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (sb.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    result.Add(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                result.Add(letter.ToString());Di2015NewLine                sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2815475Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface INodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<INode> Children { get; }Di2015NewLine    IDataNode<DataType> FindNode<DataType>(DataType value);Di2015NewLine    void AddChild(INode node);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IDataNode<DataType> : INodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataType Data { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2815475Di2015UniqueSeparatorINode.FindNode
2815475Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IDataNode<DataType> FindNode<DataType> (DataType value) {Di2015NewLine    // If we are searching for ourselves, return thisDi2015NewLine    var self = this as IDataNode<DataType>;Di2015NewLine    if (self != null && self.Data.Equals(value)) {Di2015NewLine        return self;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Otherwise:Di2015NewLine    // 1. For each of our children, call FindNode on it. This willDi2015NewLine    //    find the target node if it is our child, since each childDi2015NewLine    //    will check if it is the node we look for, like we did above.Di2015NewLine    // 2. If our child is not the one we are looking for, FindNode willDi2015NewLine    //    continue looking into its own children (depth-first search).Di2015NewLine    // 3. Return the first descendant that comes back and is not null.Di2015NewLine    //    If no node is found, FirstOrDefault means we will return null.Di2015NewLine    return this.children.Select(c => c.FindNode(value))Di2015NewLine                        .FirstOrDefault(found => found != null);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2815624Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Run()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string url;Di2015NewLine    url = "https://www.ibm.com/developerworks/mydeveloperworks/blogs/roller-ui/rendering/feed/gradybooch/entries/rss?lang=en";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest hwr = (HttpWebRequest) WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine    // attach persistent cookiesDi2015NewLine    hwr.CookieContainer =Di2015NewLine        PersistentCookies.GetCookieContainerForUrl(url);Di2015NewLine    hwr.Accept = "text/xml, */*";Di2015NewLine    hwr.Headers.Add(HttpRequestHeader.AcceptLanguage, "en-us");Di2015NewLine    hwr.UserAgent = "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 6.0; .NET CLR 3.5.30729;)";Di2015NewLine    hwr.KeepAlive = true;Di2015NewLine    hwr.AutomaticDecompression = DecompressionMethods.Deflate |Di2015NewLine                                 DecompressionMethods.GZip;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var resp = (HttpWebResponse) hwr.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using(Stream s = resp.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine        {            Di2015NewLine            string cs = String.IsNullOrEmpty(resp.CharacterSet) ? "UTF-8" : resp.CharacterSet;Di2015NewLine            Encoding e = Encoding.GetEncoding(cs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(s, e))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var allXml = sr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // remove any script blocks - they confuse XmlReaderDi2015NewLine                allXml = Regex.Replace( allXml,Di2015NewLine                                        "(.*)<script type='text/javascript'>.+?</script>(.*)",Di2015NewLine                                        "$1$2",Di2015NewLine                                        RegexOptions.Singleline);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (XmlReader xmlr = XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(allXml)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var items = from item in SyndicationFeed.Load(xmlr).ItemsDi2015NewLine                        select item;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2815648Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyViewModel : INotifyPropertyChanged, IDataErrorInfoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   private Dictionary<string, string> _Errors = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public object SomePropertyDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      get { return _SomeProperty; }Di2015NewLine      setDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         if (value != _SomeProperty && !ValidationError("SomeProperty", value))Di2015NewLine            _SomeProperty = value;Di2015NewLine            OnPropertyChanged("SomeProperty");Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   private bool ValidationError(string propertyName, object value)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      // I usually have a Dictionary<string, Func<object, string>> that maps propertyDi2015NewLine      // names to validation functions; the functions return null if the propertyDi2015NewLine      // is valid and an error message if not.  You can embed the validation logicDi2015NewLine      // in the property setters, of course, but breaking them out as separate methodsDi2015NewLine      // eases testing.Di2015NewLine      _Errors[propertyName] = _ValidationMethods[propertyName](value);Di2015NewLine      OnPropertyChanged("IsValid");Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public bool IsValidDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      get { return !(_Errors.Where(x => x.Value != null).Any()));Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public string this[string propertyName]Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      getDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         return (_Errors.ContainsKey(propertyName))Di2015NewLine            ? _Errors[propertyName]Di2015NewLine            : null;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2817201Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DataRecordExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static byte GetByte(this IDataRecord record, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Get<byte>(record, name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static short GetInt16(this IDataRecord record, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Get<short>(record, name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int GetInt32(this IDataRecord record, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Get<int>(record, name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static T Get<T>(IDataRecord record, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // When the column was not found, an IndexOutOfRangeException will be Di2015NewLine        // thrown. The message will contain the name argument.Di2015NewLine        object value = record[name];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (T)value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (InvalidCastException ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw BuildMoreExpressiveException<T>(record, name, value, ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static InvalidCastException BuildMoreExpressiveException<T>(Di2015NewLine        IDataRecord record, string name, Di2015NewLine        object value, InvalidCastException ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string exceptionMessage = string.Format(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture,Di2015NewLine            "Could not cast from {0} to {1}. Column name '{2}' of {3} " + Di2015NewLine            "could not be cast. {4}",Di2015NewLine            value == null ? "<null>" : value.GetType().Name, Di2015NewLine            typeof(T).Name, name, record.GetType().FullName, ex.Message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new InvalidCastException(exceptionMessage, ex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
