2820686Di2015UniqueSeparatortype IPs = IP[]Di2015NewLineand IP = IP of OrParts * OrParts * OrParts * OrPartsDi2015NewLineand OrParts = Or of Part[]Di2015NewLineand Part = Num of int | Range of int * intDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet Valid(x) = if x < 0 || x > 255 then failwithf "Invalid number %d" xDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet rec parseIPs (s:string) =Di2015NewLine    s.Split [|';'|] |> Array.map parseIPDi2015NewLineand parseIP s =Di2015NewLine    let [|a;b;c;d|] = s.Split [|'.'|]Di2015NewLine    IP(parseOrParts a, parseOrParts b, parseOrParts c, parseOrParts d)Di2015NewLineand parseOrParts s =Di2015NewLine    Or(s.Split [|','|] |> Array.map parsePart)Di2015NewLineand parsePart s =Di2015NewLine    if s.Contains("-") thenDi2015NewLine        let [|a;b|] = s.Split [|'-'|]Di2015NewLine        let x,y = int a, int bDi2015NewLine        Valid(x)Di2015NewLine        Valid(y)Di2015NewLine        if x > y then failwithf "Invalid range %d-%d" x yDi2015NewLine        Range(x, y)Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        let x = int sDi2015NewLine        Valid(x)Di2015NewLine        Num(x)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet rec printIPsAsRegex ips =Di2015NewLine    let sb = new System.Text.StringBuilder()Di2015NewLine    let add s = sb.Append(s:string) |> ignoreDi2015NewLine    add "("Di2015NewLine    add(System.String.Join("|", ips |> Array.map printIPAsRegex))Di2015NewLine    add ")"Di2015NewLine    sb.ToString()Di2015NewLineand printIPAsRegex (IP(a, b, c, d)) : string =Di2015NewLine    let sb = new System.Text.StringBuilder()Di2015NewLine    let add s = sb.Append(s:string) |> ignoreDi2015NewLine    add "("Di2015NewLine    printPartsAsRegex add aDi2015NewLine    add "."Di2015NewLine    printPartsAsRegex add bDi2015NewLine    add "." Di2015NewLine    printPartsAsRegex add cDi2015NewLine    add "."Di2015NewLine    printPartsAsRegex add dDi2015NewLine    add ")"Di2015NewLine    sb.ToString()Di2015NewLineand printPartsAsRegex add (Or(parts)) =Di2015NewLine    match parts withDi2015NewLine    | [| Num x |] -> // exactly one NumDi2015NewLine        add(string x)Di2015NewLine    | _ ->Di2015NewLine        add "("Di2015NewLine        add(System.String.Join("|", parts |> Array.collect (functionDi2015NewLine                | Num x -> [| x |]Di2015NewLine                | Range(x,y) -> [| x..y |])Di2015NewLine            |> Array.map (fun x -> x.ToString())))Di2015NewLine        add ")"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet Main() =Di2015NewLine    let ips = parseIPs "192.168.0.250,244-248,108,51,7;127.0.0.1"Di2015NewLine    printfn "%s" (printIPsAsRegex ips)Di2015NewLineMain()                Di2015NewLine

2822036Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ItemWithPrevious<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T Previous;Di2015NewLine    public T Current;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class MyExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IObservable<ItemWithPrevious<T>> CombineWithPrevious<T>(this IObservable<T> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var previous = default(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sourceDi2015NewLine            .Select(t => new ItemWithPrevious<T> { Previous = previous, Current = t })Di2015NewLine            .Do(items => previous = items.Current);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2826884Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Ensures that file exists and retrieves the content type Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="file"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Returns for instance "images/jpeg" </returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string getMimeFromFile(string file)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IntPtr mimeout;Di2015NewLine    if (!System.IO.File.Exists(file))Di2015NewLine    throw new FileNotFoundException(file + " not found");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int MaxContent = (int)new FileInfo(file).Length;Di2015NewLine    if (MaxContent > 4096) MaxContent = 4096;Di2015NewLine    FileStream fs = File.OpenRead(file);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] buf = new byte[MaxContent];        Di2015NewLine    fs.Read(buf, 0, MaxContent);Di2015NewLine    fs.Close();Di2015NewLine    int result = FindMimeFromData(IntPtr.Zero, file, buf, MaxContent, null, 0, out mimeout, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine    throw Marshal.GetExceptionForHR(result);Di2015NewLine    string mime = Marshal.PtrToStringUni(mimeout);Di2015NewLine    Marshal.FreeCoTaskMem(mimeout);Di2015NewLine    return mime;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2829543Di2015UniqueSeparatorApplication_EndRequest
2829543Di2015UniqueSeparatorglobal.asax
2829543Di2015UniqueSeparatorResponse.RedirectLocation
2829543Di2015UniqueSeparatorReturnUrl
2829543Di2015UniqueSeparator// parameter keyDi2015NewLineprivate static readonly string ReturnUrlParameter = "ReturnUrl";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected void Application_EndRequest(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (Response.IsRequestBeingRedirected)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Uri redirectUrl;Di2015NewLine        if (Uri.TryCreate(Response.RedirectLocation, UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute, out redirectUrl))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            redirectUrl = MakeAbsoluteUriIfNecessary(redirectUrl);Di2015NewLine            Uri currentUrl = Request.Url;Di2015NewLine            var currentQueryParameters = Di2015NewLine                    HttpUtility.ParseQueryString(HttpUtility.UrlDecode(currentUrl.Query));Di2015NewLine            // the parameter is present in the current url alreadyDi2015NewLine            if (currentQueryParameters[ReturnUrlParameter] != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                UriBuilder builder = new UriBuilder(redirectUrl);Di2015NewLine                builder.Query = Di2015NewLine                        HttpUtility.UrlDecode(builder.Query)Di2015NewLine                            .Replace(Request.Url.Query, string.Empty).TrimStart('?');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Response.RedirectLocation = Di2015NewLine                        Request.Url.MakeRelativeUri(builder.Uri).ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Uri MakeAbsoluteUriIfNecessary(Uri url)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (url.IsAbsoluteUri)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return url;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Uri currentUrl = Request.Url;Di2015NewLine        UriBuilder builder = new UriBuilder(Di2015NewLine                currentUrl.Scheme, Di2015NewLine                currentUrl.Host, Di2015NewLine                currentUrl.PortDi2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Uri(builder.Uri, 2836904Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Cursor GetRotatedCursor(byte[] curFileBytes, double rotationAngle)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Load as Bitmap, convert to BitmapSourceDi2015NewLine  var origStream = new MemoryStream(curFileBytes);Di2015NewLine  var origBitmap = new System.Drawing.Icon(origStream).ToBitmap();Di2015NewLine  var origSource = System.Windows.Interop.Imaging.CreateBitmapSourceFromHBitmap(origBitmap.GetHBitmap());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Construct rotated imageDi2015NewLine  var image = new ImageDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    BitmapSource = origSource,Di2015NewLine    RenderTransform = new RotateTransform(rotationAngle)Di2015NewLine  };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Render rotated image to RenderTargetBitmapDi2015NewLine  var width = origBitmap.Width;Di2015NewLine  var height = origBitmap.Height;Di2015NewLine  var resultSource = new RenderTargetBitmap(width, height, 96, 96, PixelFormats.Pbgra32);Di2015NewLine  resultSource.Render(image);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Convert to System.Drawing.BitmapDi2015NewLine  var pixels = new int[width*height];Di2015NewLine  resultSource.CopyPixels(pixels, width, 0);Di2015NewLine  var resultBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(width, height, System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format32bppPargb);Di2015NewLine  for(int y=0; y<height; y++)Di2015NewLine    for(int x=0; x<width; x++)Di2015NewLine      resultBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, Color.FromArgb(pixels[y*width+x]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Save to .ico formatDi2015NewLine  var resultStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine  new System.Drawing.Icon(resultBitmap.GetHIcon()).Save(resultStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Convert saved file into .cur formatDi2015NewLine  resultStream.Seek(2); resultStream.WriteByte(curFileBytes, 2, 1);Di2015NewLine  resultStream.Seek(10); resultStream.WriteByte(curFileBytes, 10, 2);Di2015NewLine  resultStream.Seek(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Construct CursorDi2015NewLine  return new Cursor(resultStream);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2840517Di2015UniqueSeparator\\[         # match the character '['Di2015NewLine(          # start capture group 1Di2015NewLine  [^|]+    #   match any character except '|' and repeat it one or more timesDi2015NewLine)          # end capture group 1Di2015NewLine\\|         # match the character '|'Di2015NewLine[^]]*      # match any character except ']' and repeat it zero or more timesDi2015NewLine]          # match the character ']'Di2015NewLine

2840824Di2015UniqueSeparatorSecant Sec(X) = 1 / Cos(X) Di2015NewLineCosecant Cosec(X) = 1 / Sin(X) Di2015NewLineCotangent Cotan(X) = 1 / Tan(X) Di2015NewLineInverse Sine Arcsin(X) = Atn(X / Sqr(-X * X + 1)) Di2015NewLineInverse Cosine Arccos(X) = Atn(-X / Sqr(-X * X + 1)) + 2 * Atn(1) Di2015NewLineInverse Secant Arcsec(X) = 2 * Atn(1)  Atn(Sgn(X) / Sqr(X * X  1)) Di2015NewLineInverse Cosecant Arccosec(X) = Atn(Sgn(X) / Sqr(X * X  1)) Di2015NewLineInverse Cotangent Arccotan(X) = 2 * Atn(1) - Atn(X) Di2015NewLineHyperbolic Sine HSin(X) = (Exp(X)  Exp(-X)) / 2 Di2015NewLineHyperbolic Cosine HCos(X) = (Exp(X) + Exp(-X)) / 2 Di2015NewLineHyperbolic Tangent HTan(X) = (Exp(X)  Exp(-X)) / (Exp(X) + Exp(-X)) Di2015NewLineHyperbolic Secant HSec(X) = 2 / (Exp(X) + Exp(-X)) Di2015NewLineHyperbolic Cosecant HCosec(X) = 2 / (Exp(X)  Exp(-X)) Di2015NewLineHyperbolic Cotangent HCotan(X) = (Exp(X) + Exp(-X)) / (Exp(X)  Exp(-X)) Di2015NewLineInverse Hyperbolic Sine HArcsin(X) = Log(X + Sqr(X * X + 1)) Di2015NewLineInverse Hyperbolic Cosine HArccos(X) = Log(X + Sqr(X * X  1)) Di2015NewLineInverse Hyperbolic Tangent HArctan(X) = Log((1 + X) / (1  X)) / 2 Di2015NewLineInverse Hyperbolic Secant HArcsec(X) = Log((Sqr(-X * X + 1) + 1) / X) Di2015NewLineInverse Hyperbolic Cosecant HArccosec(X) = Log((Sgn(X) * Sqr(X * X + 1) + 1) / X) Di2015NewLineInverse Hyperbolic Cotangent HArccotan(X) = Log((X + 1) / (X  1)) / 2 Di2015NewLineLogarithm to base N LogN(X) = Log(X) / Log(N) Di2015NewLine

2841459Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport java.awt.BasicStroke;Di2015NewLineimport java.awt.Shape;Di2015NewLineimport java.awt.geom.Path2D;Di2015NewLineimport java.awt.geom.PathIterator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class StrokePathDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void main(String[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // set line width to 6, use bevel for line joinsDi2015NewLine        BasicStroke bs = new BasicStroke(6.0f, BasicStroke.CAP_SQUARE, BasicStroke.JOIN_BEVEL);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create a path for the inputDi2015NewLine        Path2D p = new Path2D.Float();Di2015NewLine        p.moveTo(50.0, 50.0);Di2015NewLine        p.lineTo(65.0, 100.0);Di2015NewLine        p.lineTo(70.0, 60.0);Di2015NewLine        p.lineTo(120.0, 65.0);Di2015NewLine        p.lineTo(40.0, 200.0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create outline of wide lines by stroking the path with the strokeDi2015NewLine        Shape s = bs.createStrokedShape(p);Di2015NewLine        // output each of the segments of the stroked path for the output polygonDi2015NewLine        PathIterator pi = s.getPathIterator(null);Di2015NewLine        while (!pi.isDone())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pi.next();Di2015NewLine            double[] coords = new double[6];Di2015NewLine            int type = pi.currentSegment(coords);Di2015NewLine            switch (type)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            case PathIterator.SEG_LINETO:Di2015NewLine                System.out.println(String.format("SEG_LINETO %f,%f", coords[0], coords[1]));Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case PathIterator.SEG_CLOSE:Di2015NewLine                System.out.println("SEG_CLOSE");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case PathIterator.SEG_MOVETO:Di2015NewLine                System.out.println(String.format("SEG_MOVETO %f,%f", coords[0], coords[1]));Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                System.out.println("*** More complicated than LINETO... Maybe should use FlatteningPathIterator? ***");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2842599Di2015UniqueSeparator// Project: SalientDi2015NewLine// http://salient.codeplex.comDi2015NewLine// Date: April 16 2010Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Globalization;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.NetworkInformation;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.VisualStudio.WebHost;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Salient.ExcerptsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A general purpose Microsoft.VisualStudio.WebHost.Server test fixture.Di2015NewLine    /// WebHost.Server is the core of the Visual Studio Development Server (WebDev.WebServer).Di2015NewLine    ///Di2015NewLine    /// This server is run in-process and may be used in F5 debugging.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// If you are adding this source code to a new project, You will need toDi2015NewLine    /// manually add a reference to WebDev.WebHost.dll to your project. It cannotDi2015NewLine    /// be added from within Visual Studio.Di2015NewLine    ///Di2015NewLine    /// Please see the Readme.txt accompanying this code for details.Di2015NewLine    /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// NOTE: code from various namespaces/classes in the Salient project have been merged into thisDi2015NewLine    /// single class for this post in the interest of brevityDi2015NewLine    public class WebHostServerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Server _server;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string ApplicationPath { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string HostName { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Port { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string VirtualPath { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string RootUrlDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return string.Format(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, "http://{0}:{1}{2}", HostName, Port, VirtualPath); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Combine the RootUrl of the running web application with the relative url specified.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public virtual Uri NormalizeUri(string relativeUrl)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new Uri(RootUrl + relativeUrl);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Will start "localhost" on first available port in the range 8000-10000 with vpath "/"Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="applicationPath"></param>Di2015NewLine        public void StartServer(string applicationPath)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StartServer(applicationPath, GetAvailablePort(8000, 10000, IPAddress.Loopback, true), "/", "localhost");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="applicationPath">Physical path to application.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="port">Port to listen on.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="virtualPath">Optional. defaults to "/"</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="hostName">Optional. Is used to construct RootUrl. Defaults to "localhost"</param>Di2015NewLine        public void StartServer(string applicationPath, int port, string virtualPath, string hostName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_server != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Server already started");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // WebHost.Server will not run on any other IPDi2015NewLine            IPAddress ipAddress = IPAddress.Loopback;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(!IsPortAvailable(ipAddress, port))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception(string.Format("Port {0} is in use.", port));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            applicationPath = Path.GetFullPath(applicationPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            virtualPath = String.Format("/{0}/", (virtualPath ?? string.Empty).Trim('/')).Replace("//", "/");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _server = new Server(port, virtualPath, applicationPath, false, false);Di2015NewLine            _server.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ApplicationPath = applicationPath;Di2015NewLine            Port = port;Di2015NewLine            VirtualPath = virtualPath;Di2015NewLine            HostName = string.IsNullOrEmpty(hostName) ? "localhost" : hostName;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Stops the server.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public void StopServer()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_server != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _server.Stop();Di2015NewLine                _server = null;Di2015NewLine                // allow some time to release the portDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StopServer();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gently polls specified IP:Port to determine if it is available.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="ipAddress"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="port"></param>Di2015NewLine        public static bool IsPortAvailable(IPAddress ipAddress, int port)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool portAvailable = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                portAvailable = GetAvailablePort(port, port, ipAddress, true) == port;Di2015NewLine                if (portAvailable)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // be a little patient and wait for the port if necessary,Di2015NewLine                // the previous occupant may have just vacatedDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return portAvailable;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns first available port on the specified IP address.Di2015NewLine        /// The port scan excludes ports that are open on ANY loopback adapter.Di2015NewLine        ///Di2015NewLine        /// If the address upon which a port is requested is an 'ANY' address allDi2015NewLine        /// ports that are open on ANY IP are excluded.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="rangeStart"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="rangeEnd"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="ip">The IP address upon which to search for available port.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="includeIdlePorts">If true includes ports in TIME_WAIT state in results.Di2015NewLine        /// TIME_WAIT state is typically cool down period for recently released ports.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static int GetAvailablePort(int rangeStart, int rangeEnd, IPAddress ip, bool includeIdlePorts)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IPGlobalProperties ipProps = IPGlobalProperties.GetIPGlobalProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if the ip we want a port on is an 'any' or loopback port we need to exclude all ports that are active on any IPDi2015NewLine            Func<IPAddress, bool> isIpAnyOrLoopBack = i => IPAddress.Any.Equals(i) ||Di2015NewLine                                                           IPAddress.IPv6Any.Equals(i) ||Di2015NewLine                                                           IPAddress.Loopback.Equals(i) ||Di2015NewLine                                                           IPAddress.IPv6Loopback.Di2015NewLine                                                               Equals(i);Di2015NewLine            // get all active ports on specified IP.Di2015NewLine            List<ushort> excludedPorts = new List<ushort>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if a port is open on an 'any' or 'loopback' interface then include it in the excludedPortsDi2015NewLine            excludedPorts.AddRange(from n in ipProps.GetActiveTcpConnections()Di2015NewLine                                   whereDi2015NewLine                                       n.LocalEndPoint.Port >= rangeStart &&Di2015NewLine                                       n.LocalEndPoint.Port <= rangeEnd && (Di2015NewLine                                       isIpAnyOrLoopBack(ip) || n.LocalEndPoint.Address.Equals(ip) ||Di2015NewLine                                        isIpAnyOrLoopBack(n.LocalEndPoint.Address)) &&Di2015NewLine                                        (!includeIdlePorts || n.State != TcpState.TimeWait)Di2015NewLine                                   select (ushort)n.LocalEndPoint.Port);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            excludedPorts.AddRange(from n in ipProps.GetActiveTcpListeners()Di2015NewLine                                   where n.Port >= rangeStart && n.Port <= rangeEnd && (Di2015NewLine                                   isIpAnyOrLoopBack(ip) || n.Address.Equals(ip) || isIpAnyOrLoopBack(n.Address))Di2015NewLine                                   select (ushort)n.Port);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            excludedPorts.AddRange(from n in ipProps.GetActiveUdpListeners()Di2015NewLine                                   where n.Port >= rangeStart && n.Port <= rangeEnd && (Di2015NewLine                                   isIpAnyOrLoopBack(ip) || n.Address.Equals(ip) || isIpAnyOrLoopBack(n.Address))Di2015NewLine                                   select (ushort)n.Port);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            excludedPorts.Sort();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int port = rangeStart; port <= rangeEnd; port++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!excludedPorts.Contains((ushort)port))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return port;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine    WebRequest request = WebRequest.Create ("http://www.contoso.com/PostAccepter.aspx ");Di2015NewLine    // Set the Method property of the request to POST.Di2015NewLine    request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    // Create POST data and convert it to a byte array.Di2015NewLine    string postData = "This is a test that posts this string to a Web server.";Di2015NewLine    byte[] byteArray = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes (postData);Di2015NewLine    // Set the ContentType property of the WebRequest.Di2015NewLine    request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine    // Set the ContentLength property of the WebRequest.Di2015NewLine    request.ContentLength = byteArray.Length;Di2015NewLine    // Get the request stream.Di2015NewLine    Stream dataStream = request.GetRequestStream ();Di2015NewLine    // Write the data to the request stream.Di2015NewLine    dataStream.Write (byteArray, 0, byteArray.Length);Di2015NewLine    // Close the Stream object.Di2015NewLine    dataStream.Close ();Di2015NewLine    // Get the response.Di2015NewLine    WebResponse response = request.GetResponse ();Di2015NewLine    // Display the status.Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine (((HttpWebResponse)response).StatusDescription);Di2015NewLine    // Get the stream containing content returned by the server.Di2015NewLine    dataStream = response.GetResponseStream ();Di2015NewLine    // Open the stream using a StreamReader for easy access.Di2015NewLine    StreamReader reader = new StreamReader (dataStream);Di2015NewLine    // Read the content.Di2015NewLine    string responseFromServer = reader.ReadToEnd ();Di2015NewLine    // Display the content.Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine (responseFromServer);Di2015NewLine    // Clean up the streams.Di2015NewLine    reader.Close ();Di2015NewLine    dataStream.Close ();Di2015NewLine    response.Close ();Di2015NewLine

2845051Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static partial class MoreEnumerableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TResult> GenerateByIndex<TResult>(Func<int, TResult> generator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Looping over 0...int.MaxValue inclusive is a pain. Simplest is to go exclusive,Di2015NewLine        // then go again for int.MaxValue.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < int.MaxValue; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return generator(i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return generator(int.MaxValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private void test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime startDate = DateTime.Now.AddDays(-29);Di2015NewLine        DateTime endDate = DateTime.Now.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var dc = new DataContext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //get database sales from 29 days ago at midnight to the end of todayDi2015NewLine            var salesForPeriod = dc.Orders.Where(b => b.OrderDateTime > startDate.Date  && b.OrderDateTime <= endDate.Date);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var allDays = MoreEnumerable.GenerateByIndex(i => startDate.AddDays(i)).Take(30);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var salesByDay = from s in salesForPeriodDi2015NewLine                        group s by s.OrderDateTime.Date into gDi2015NewLine                        select new {Day = g.Key, totalSales = g.Sum(x=>(decimal)x.OrderPrice};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var query = from d in allDaysDi2015NewLine                        join s in salesByDay on s.Day equals dDi2015NewLine                        select new {Day = s.Day , totalSales = (s != null) ? s.totalSales : 0m;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var item in query)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Response.Write("Date: " +item.Day.ToString() " Sales: " + String.Format("{0:0.00}", item.totalSales) + "<br>");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2846551Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string WrapText(string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  string[] words = text.Split(' ');Di2015NewLine  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine  float linewidth = 0f;Di2015NewLine  float maxLine = 250f; //a bit smaller than the box so you can have some padding...etcDi2015NewLine  float spaceWidth = spriteFont.MeasureString(" ").X;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (string word in words)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Vector2 size = spriteFont.MeasureString(word);Di2015NewLine    if (linewidth + size.X < 250)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      sb.Append(word + " ");Di2015NewLine      linewidth += size.X + spaceWidth;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      sb.Append("\\n" + word + " ");Di2015NewLine      linewidth = size.X + spaceWidth;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2852363Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunction DataTableFromCSV(ByVal filename As String) As DataTableDi2015NewLine    Dim table As New DataTableDi2015NewLine    Dim colAdded As Boolean = FalseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    For Each record As IList(Of String) In CSV.FromFile(filename)Di2015NewLine        ''# Add column headers on first iterationDi2015NewLine        If Not colAdded ThenDi2015NewLine            For Each token As String In recordDi2015NewLine                table.Columns.Add(token)Di2015NewLine            Next tokenDi2015NewLine            colAdded = TrueDi2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            ''# add the row to the tableDi2015NewLine            Dim row As DataRow = table.NewRow()Di2015NewLine            For i As Integer = 0 To table.Columns.Count - 1Di2015NewLine                row(i) = record(i)Di2015NewLine            NextDi2015NewLine            table.Rows.Add(row)Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    Next recordDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Return tableDi2015NewLineEnd Function  Di2015NewLine

2852595Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Func<A, R> Memoize<A, R>(this Func<A, R> f)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var d = new Dictionary<A, R>();Di2015NewLine    return a=> Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        R r;Di2015NewLine        if (!d.TryGetValue(a, out r))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            r = f(a);Di2015NewLine            d.Add(a, r);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return r;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLine

2853695Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BoundObservableCollection<T, TSource> : ObservableCollection<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private ObservableCollection<TSource> _source;Di2015NewLine    private Func<TSource, T> _converter;Di2015NewLine    private Func<T, TSource, bool> _isSameSource;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BoundObservableCollection(Di2015NewLine        ObservableCollection<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine        Func<TSource, T> converter,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, TSource, bool> isSameSource)Di2015NewLine        : base()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _source = source;Di2015NewLine        _converter = converter;Di2015NewLine        _isSameSource = isSameSource;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy itemsDi2015NewLine        AddItems(_source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Subscribe to the source's CollectionChanged eventDi2015NewLine        _source.CollectionChanged += new System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler(_source_CollectionChanged);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AddItems(IEnumerable<TSource> items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var sourceItem in items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Add(_converter(sourceItem));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void _source_CollectionChanged(object sender, System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (e.Action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add:Di2015NewLine                AddItems(e.NewItems.Cast<TSource>());Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move:Di2015NewLine                // Not sure what to do here...Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove:Di2015NewLine                foreach (var sourceItem in e.OldItems.Cast<TSource>())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var toRemove = this.First(item => _isSameSource(item, sourceItem));Di2015NewLine                    this.Remove(toRemove);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace:Di2015NewLine                for (int i = e.NewStartingIndex; i < e.NewItems.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this[i] = _converter((TSource)e.NewItems[i]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset:Di2015NewLine                this.Clear();Di2015NewLine                this.AddItems(_source);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2854469Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void OuterJoinSimpleExample()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var customers = new List<Customer>() { Di2015NewLine        new Customer {Key = 1, Name = "Gottshall" },Di2015NewLine        new Customer {Key = 2, Name = "Valdes" },Di2015NewLine        new Customer {Key = 3, Name = "Gauwain" },Di2015NewLine        new Customer {Key = 4, Name = "Deane" },Di2015NewLine        new Customer {Key = 5, Name = "Zeeman" } Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var orders = new List<Order>() {Di2015NewLine        new Order {Key = 1, OrderNumber = "Order 1" },Di2015NewLine        new Order {Key = 1, OrderNumber = "Order 2" },Di2015NewLine        new Order {Key = 4, OrderNumber = "Order 3" },Di2015NewLine        new Order {Key = 4, OrderNumber = "Order 4" },Di2015NewLine        new Order {Key = 5, OrderNumber = "Order 5" },Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var q = from c in customersDi2015NewLine            join o in orders on c.Key equals o.Key into outerDi2015NewLine            from o in outer.DefaultIfEmpty()Di2015NewLine            select new { Di2015NewLine                Name = c.Name, Di2015NewLine                OrderNumber = ((o == null) ? "(no orders)" : o.OrderNumber) Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var i in q) {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Customer: {0}  Order Number: {1}", Di2015NewLine            i.Name.PadRight(11, ' '), i.OrderNumber);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2856031Di2015UniqueSeparatorDELIMITER $$Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS `sample`.`InsGen` $$Di2015NewLineCREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` PROCEDURE `InsGen`(Di2015NewLinein_db varchar(20),Di2015NewLinein_table varchar(20),Di2015NewLinein_ColumnName varchar(20),Di2015NewLinein_ColumnValue varchar(20)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedeclare Whrs varchar(500);Di2015NewLinedeclare Sels varchar(500);Di2015NewLinedeclare Inserts varchar(200);Di2015NewLinedeclare tablename varchar(20);Di2015NewLinedeclare ColName varchar(20);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineset tablename=in_table;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine# Comma separated column names - used for SelectDi2015NewLineselect group_concat(concat('concat(\\'"\\',','ifnull(',column_name,','''')',',\\'"\\')'))Di2015NewLineINTO @Sels from information_schema.columns where table_schema=in_db and table_name=tablename;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine# Comma separated column names - used for Group ByDi2015NewLineselect group_concat('`',column_name,'`')Di2015NewLineINTO @Whrs from information_schema.columns where table_schema=in_db and table_name=tablename;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#Main Select Statement for fetching comma separated table valuesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine set @Inserts=concat("select concat('insert IGNORE into ", in_db,".",tablename," values(',concat_ws(',',",@Sels,"),');')Di2015NewLine as MyColumn from ", in_db,".",tablename, " where ", in_ColumnName, " = " , in_ColumnValue, " group by ",@Whrs, ";");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine PREPARE Inserts FROM @Inserts;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEXECUTE Inserts;                    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEND $$Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDELIMITER ;Di2015NewLine
2856041Di2015UniqueSeparator private static bool CopyDirectory(string SourcePath, string DestinationPath, bool overwriteexisting)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool ret = true;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SourcePath = SourcePath.EndsWith(@"\\") ? SourcePath : SourcePath + @"\\";Di2015NewLine                DestinationPath = DestinationPath.EndsWith(@"\\") ? DestinationPath : DestinationPath + @"\\";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (Directory.Exists(SourcePath))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (Directory.Exists(DestinationPath) == false)Di2015NewLine                        Directory.CreateDirectory(DestinationPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    foreach (string fls in Directory.GetFiles(SourcePath))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        FileInfo flinfo = new FileInfo(fls);Di2015NewLine                        flinfo.CopyTo(DestinationPath + flinfo.Name, overwriteexisting);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    foreach (string drs in Directory.GetDirectories(SourcePath))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        DirectoryInfo drinfo = new DirectoryInfo(drs);Di2015NewLine                        if (CopyDirectory(drs, DestinationPath + drinfo.Name, overwriteexisting) == false)Di2015NewLine                            ret = false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    Directory.CreateDirectory(DI_Target + "//Database");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ret = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ret = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return ret;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

2857527Di2015UniqueSeparatorgrammar ASTDemo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineoptions { Di2015NewLine  output=AST; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetokens {Di2015NewLine  ROOT;Di2015NewLine  EXPRESSION;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineparseDi2015NewLine  :  (expression ';')+ -> ^(ROOT expression+) // omit the semi-colonDi2015NewLine  ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineexpressionDi2015NewLine  :  addExp -> ^(EXPRESSION addExp)Di2015NewLine  ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineaddExpDi2015NewLine  :  multExpDi2015NewLine     ( '+'^ multExpDi2015NewLine     | '-'^ multExpDi2015NewLine     )*Di2015NewLine  ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemultExpDi2015NewLine  :  powerExpDi2015NewLine     ( '*'^ powerExpDi2015NewLine     | '/'^ powerExpDi2015NewLine     )*Di2015NewLine  ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepowerExpDi2015NewLine  :  atom ('^'^ atom)*Di2015NewLine  ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineatomDi2015NewLine  :  NumberDi2015NewLine  |  '(' expression ')' -> expression // omit the parenthesisDi2015NewLine  ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineNumberDi2015NewLine  :  Digit+ ('.' Digit+)?Di2015NewLine  ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefragmentDi2015NewLineDigitDi2015NewLine  :  '0'..'9'Di2015NewLine  ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSpaceDi2015NewLine  :  (' ' | '\\t' | '\\r' | '\\n') {skip();}Di2015NewLine  ;Di2015NewLine

2857527Di2015UniqueSeparator"12 * (5 - 6); 2^3^(4 + 1);"
2857527Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport org.antlr.runtime.*;Di2015NewLineimport org.antlr.runtime.tree.*;Di2015NewLineimport org.antlr.stringtemplate.*;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MainASTDemo {Di2015NewLine    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {Di2015NewLine        ANTLRStringStream in = new ANTLRStringStream("12 * (5 - 6); 2^3^(4 + 1);");Di2015NewLine        ASTDemoLexer lexer = new ASTDemoLexer(in);Di2015NewLine        CommonTokenStream tokens = new CommonTokenStream(lexer);Di2015NewLine        ASTDemoParser parser = new ASTDemoParser(tokens);Di2015NewLine        ASTDemoParser.parse_return returnValue = parser.parse();Di2015NewLine        CommonTree tree = (CommonTree)returnValue.getTree();Di2015NewLine        DOTTreeGenerator gen = new DOTTreeGenerator();Di2015NewLine        StringTemplate st = gen.toDOT(tree);Di2015NewLine        System.out.println(st);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2857841Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Resize the image to the specified width and height. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="image">The image to resize.</param> Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="width">The width to resize to.</param> Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="height">The height to resize to.</param> Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The resized image.</returns> Di2015NewLine    public static System.Drawing.Bitmap ResizeImage(System.Drawing.Image image, int width, int height) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        //a holder for the result Di2015NewLine        Bitmap result = new Bitmap(width, height); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //use a graphics object to draw the resized image into the bitmap Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics graphics = Graphics.FromImage(result)) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            //set the resize quality modes to high quality Di2015NewLine            graphics.CompositingQuality = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingQuality.HighQuality; Di2015NewLine            graphics.InterpolationMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic; Di2015NewLine            graphics.SmoothingMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.SmoothingMode.HighQuality; Di2015NewLine            //draw the image into the target bitmap Di2015NewLine            graphics.DrawImage(image, 0, 0, result.Width, result.Height); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //return the resulting bitmap Di2015NewLine        return result; Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine

2859356Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void EncryptFile(Di2015NewLine        Stream  outputStream,Di2015NewLine        string  fileName,Di2015NewLine        char[]  passPhrase,Di2015NewLine        bool    armor,Di2015NewLine        bool    withIntegrityCheck)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (armor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            outputStream = new ArmoredOutputStream(outputStream);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemoryStream bOut = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PgpCompressedDataGenerator comData = new PgpCompressedDataGenerator(Di2015NewLine            CompressionAlgorithmTag.Zip);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PgpUtilities.WriteFileToLiteralData(Di2015NewLine            comData.Open(bOut),Di2015NewLine            PgpLiteralData.Binary,Di2015NewLine            new FileInfo(fileName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        comData.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = bOut.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PgpEncryptedDataGenerator cPk = new PgpEncryptedDataGenerator(Di2015NewLine            SymmetricKeyAlgorithmTag.Cast5, withIntegrityCheck, new SecureRandom());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cPk.AddMethod(passPhrase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stream cOut = cPk.Open(outputStream, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cOut.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cOut.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (armor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            outputStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2859830Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.NetworkInformation;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication7Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            NetworkInterface[]         {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Network adapter: {0}", adapters[i].Name);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("    Status:            {0}",    Console.WriteLine("    IsReceiveOnly:     {0}", adapters[i].IsReceiveOnly);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("    MAC:               {0}", adapters[i].GetPhysicalAddress().ToString());Di2015NewLine                if (adapters[i].NetworkInterfaceType != NetworkInterfaceType.Loopback)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    IPInterfaceProperties IPIP = adapters[i].GetIPProperties();Di2015NewLine                    if (IPIP != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // First 2861385Di2015UniqueSeparator        '''<summary>Di2015NewLine    ''' Retrieved the data in spreadsheet to a ADO.net dataset. This should make things mega easy to work with. Di2015NewLine    ''' See Microsoft KB316934 for details on how this was done.Di2015NewLine    ''' Optional First row = field titles method variable, which extends the options available to the calling application.Di2015NewLine    '''</summary>Di2015NewLine    '''<example>Di2015NewLine    ''' When passing in the variable "SheetorNamedRangeorSheetNumber" please use the following examples.Di2015NewLine    '''    Use the sheet name followed by a dollar sign (for example, [Sheet1$] or [My Worksheet$]). A workbook table that is referenced in this manner includes the whole used range of the worksheet.Di2015NewLine    '''Select * from [Sheet1$]Di2015NewLine    '''    Use a range with a defined name (for example, [MyNamedRange]):Di2015NewLine    '''Select * from [MyNamedRange]Di2015NewLine    '''    Use a range with a specific address (for example, [Sheet1$A1:B10]):Di2015NewLine    '''Select * from [Sheet1$A1:B10]Di2015NewLine    '''</example>Di2015NewLine    ''' <param name="filePath">The full path to the excel file. If you pass in a relative path, it will be automatically converted to a full path. The file has to exist for this method to return a dataset.  If the file doesn't exist a FileNotFoundException will be raised.</param>Di2015NewLine    ''' <param name="firstRowTitles">Boolean to indicate if the first row of the spreadsheet contains column titles.</param>Di2015NewLine    ''' <param name="readAsTextData">Boolean to indicate if the spreadsheet should be read as as text data.  This is particularly important for columns that may contain mixed numberic and alpha numeric data.  </param>Di2015NewLine    ''' <remarks>Di2015NewLine    ''' Its not possible to open and excel workbook via this method if there is password protection on the workbook.  It could be removedDi2015NewLine    ''' by automation and then loaded or manaully removed before running this code.Di2015NewLine    '''Di2015NewLine    '''   LL: The IMEX=1 setting then references the values set in the Windows registryDi2015NewLine    '''Di2015NewLine    ''' Check the following registry settings for the *machine*:Di2015NewLine    ''' Hkey_Local_Machine/Software/Microsoft/Jet/4.0/Engines/Excel/TypeGuessRowsDi2015NewLine    ''' Hkey_Local_Machine/Software/Microsoft/Jet/4.0/Engines/Excel/ImportMixedTypesDi2015NewLine    ''' Hkey_Local_Machine/SOFTWARE/Wow6432Node/Microsoft/Jet/4.0/Engines/ExcelDi2015NewLine    ''' TypeGuessRows: setting the value to 0 (zero) will force ADO to scanDi2015NewLine    ''' all column values before choosing the appropriate data type.Di2015NewLine    ''' ImportMixedTypes: should be set to value 'Text' i.e. import mixed-typeDi2015NewLine    ''' columns as text:Di2015NewLine    ''' Using IMEX=1 in the connection string (as you have done) ensures theDi2015NewLine    ''' registry setting is applied.Di2015NewLine    ''' Office 2007 data drivers can be downloaded free at <see>http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=7554F536-8C28-4598-9B72-EF94E038C891&displaylang=en</see>Di2015NewLine    ''' Di2015NewLine    ''' </remarks>Di2015NewLine    Overloads Function GetDataSet(ByVal filePath As String, ByVal sheetOrNamedRangeOrSheetNumber As String, ByVal firstRowTitles As Boolean, ByVal readAsTextData As Boolean) As System.Data.DataSetDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Dim strConnectionString As String = String.EmptyDi2015NewLine        Dim connection As New System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionDi2015NewLine        Dim cmd As New System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandDi2015NewLine        Dim adp As New System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapterDi2015NewLine        Dim dset As New System.Data.DataSetDi2015NewLine        Dim strSheetName As StringDi2015NewLine        Dim ExcelFileInfo As System.IO.FileInfoDi2015NewLine        '   Registry manipulation features.Di2015NewLine        Dim currentJetRegistryValue As String = "19"Di2015NewLine        '   Excel file extension handlingDi2015NewLine        Dim ExcelFileType As Excel.ExcelVersion = ExcelVersion.UnknownDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ExcelFileInfo = New System.IO.FileInfo(filePath)Di2015NewLine        If ExcelFileInfo.Exists ThenDi2015NewLine            Select Case ExcelFileInfo.Extension.ToLowerDi2015NewLine                Case ".xls"Di2015NewLine                    ExcelFileType = ExcelVersion.Excel97_2003Di2015NewLine                Case ".xlsx"Di2015NewLine                    ExcelFileType = ExcelVersion.Excel2007Di2015NewLine                Case ElseDi2015NewLine                    ExcelFileType = ExcelVersion.UnknownDi2015NewLine                    Throw New ExcelException(-2, String.Format("Excel file extension '{0}' is not valid or code changes are required to handle that file extension.", ExcelFileInfo.Extension), "")Di2015NewLine            End SelectDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TryDi2015NewLine                Select Case ExcelFileTypeDi2015NewLine                    Case ExcelVersion.Excel97_2003Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        '   Need to get the current registry setting, because we can change the value temporarilyDi2015NewLine                        currentJetRegistryValue = Me.GetJetExcelRegistryDi2015NewLine                        If currentJetRegistryValue <> "0" ThenDi2015NewLine                            Me.UpdateJetExcelRegistry("0")Di2015NewLine                        End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        If readAsTextData ThenDi2015NewLine                            If firstRowTitles ThenDi2015NewLine                                strConnectionString = System.String.Format(My.Resources.ExcelConnectionWithHeaderAllText, ExcelFileInfo.FullName)Di2015NewLine                            ElseDi2015NewLine                                strConnectionString = System.String.Format(My.Resources.ExcelConnectionWithoutHeaderAllText, ExcelFileInfo.FullName)Di2015NewLine                            End IfDi2015NewLine                        ElseDi2015NewLine                            If firstRowTitles ThenDi2015NewLine                                strConnectionString = System.String.Format(My.Resources.ExcelConnectionWithHeader, ExcelFileInfo.FullName)Di2015NewLine                            ElseDi2015NewLine                                strConnectionString = System.String.Format(My.Resources.ExcelConnectionWithoutHeader, ExcelFileInfo.FullName)Di2015NewLine                            End IfDi2015NewLine                        End IfDi2015NewLine                    Case ExcelVersion.Excel2007Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        '   Need to get the current registry setting, because we can change the value temporarilyDi2015NewLine                        currentJetRegistryValue = Me.GetExcel2007RegistryDi2015NewLine                        If currentJetRegistryValue <> "0" ThenDi2015NewLine                            Me.UpdateExcel2007Registry("0")Di2015NewLine                        End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        If firstRowTitles ThenDi2015NewLine                            strConnectionString = System.String.Format(My.Resources.Excel2007ConnectionWithHeaderAllText, ExcelFileInfo.FullName)Di2015NewLine                        ElseDi2015NewLine                            strConnectionString = System.String.Format(My.Resources.Excel2007ConnectionWithoutHeaderAllText, ExcelFileInfo.FullName)Di2015NewLine                        End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                End SelectDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                If strConnectionString = String.Empty ThenDi2015NewLine                    Throw New ExcelException(-3, "Excel Connection string hasn't been set.", "")Di2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                connection = New System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionDi2015NewLine                With connectionDi2015NewLine                    .ConnectionString = strConnectionStringDi2015NewLine                    .Open()Di2015NewLine                End WithDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                '   Create a command connectionDi2015NewLine                cmd = New System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandDi2015NewLine                With cmdDi2015NewLine                    .Connection = connectionDi2015NewLine                    .CommandType = CommandType.TextDi2015NewLine                    If IsNumeric(sheetOrNamedRangeOrSheetNumber) = True ThenDi2015NewLine                        '   Ok extract the sheet name from the connection firstDi2015NewLine                        Dim objDT As New System.Data.DataTableDi2015NewLine                        objDT = connection.GetOleDbSchemaTable(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbSchemaGuid.Tables, New Object() {Nothing, Nothing, Nothing, "TABLE"})Di2015NewLine                        strSheetName = objDT.Rows(CInt(sheetOrNamedRangeOrSheetNumber)).Item("TABLE_NAME").ToStringDi2015NewLine                        objDT = NothingDi2015NewLine                        .CommandText = System.String.Format(System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, My.Resources.ExcelSelectStatement, strSheetName)Di2015NewLine                    ElseDi2015NewLine                        '   Must be a name, range or name Cell referenceDi2015NewLine                        .CommandText = System.String.Format(System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, My.Resources.ExcelSelectStatement, sheetOrNamedRangeOrSheetNumber)Di2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    '.ExecuteReader()        'Forward only DatasetDi2015NewLine                End WithDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                '   Create a data adapter to store the inforamtionDi2015NewLine                adp = New System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapterDi2015NewLine                dset = New DataSetDi2015NewLine                With adpDi2015NewLine                    .SelectCommand = cmdDi2015NewLine                    .Fill(dset, My.Resources.DataSetTableName)Di2015NewLine                End WithDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Select Case ExcelFileTypeDi2015NewLine                    Case ExcelVersion.Excel97_2003Di2015NewLine                        '   Restore the Excel readrows value, as we have finished with our modification.Di2015NewLine                        If currentJetRegistryValue <> Me.GetJetExcelRegistry ThenDi2015NewLine                            '   Restore the registry setting (Securtiy implications)Di2015NewLine                            Me.UpdateJetExcelRegistry(currentJetRegistryValue)Di2015NewLine                        End IfDi2015NewLine                    Case ExcelVersion.Excel2007Di2015NewLine                        '   Restore the Excel readrows value, as we have finished with our modification.Di2015NewLine                        If currentJetRegistryValue <> Me.GetExcel2007Registry ThenDi2015NewLine                            '   Restore the registry setting (Securtiy implications)Di2015NewLine                            Me.UpdateExcel2007Registry(currentJetRegistryValue)Di2015NewLine                        End IfDi2015NewLine                End SelectDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                '   Return the resulting dataset to the calling applicationDi2015NewLine                GetDataSet = dsetDi2015NewLine            Catch comex As System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMExceptionDi2015NewLine                Throw New ExcelException(comex.ErrorCode, comex.Message, comex.InnerException)Di2015NewLine            Catch ex As System.InvalidOperationExceptionDi2015NewLine                Throw New ExcelException(-1, ex.Message, ex.InnerException)Di2015NewLine            FinallyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                If Not cmd Is Nothing Then cmd = NothingDi2015NewLine                If Not connection Is Nothing ThenDi2015NewLine                    connection.Close()Di2015NewLine                    connection.Dispose()Di2015NewLine                    connection = NothingDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine                If Not adp Is Nothing Then adp = NothingDi2015NewLine                If Not dset Is Nothing Then dset = NothingDi2015NewLine            End TryDi2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            Throw New i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine                RemoveMenu(HMENU, 0, (MF_BYPOSITION | MF_REMOVE));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //force a redrawDi2015NewLine            DrawMenuBar(proc.MainWindowHandle);Di2015NewLine            SetWindowLong(pFoundWindow, GWL_STYLE, (style & ~WS_SYSMENU)); (String)d.GetValue(RoutedEventNameProperty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>  Di2015NewLine    /// Sets the RoutedEventName property.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>  Di2015NewLine    public static void SetRoutedEventName(DependencyObject d, String value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        d.SetValue(RoutedEventNameProperty, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Hooks up a Dynamically created EventHandler (by using theDi2015NewLine    /// <see cref="MouseDoubleClickEventHooker">MouseDoubleClickEventHooker</see> class) that when  Di2015NewLine    /// run will run the associated ICommand  Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private static void OnRoutedEventNameChanged(DependencyObject d,Di2015NewLine        DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        String routedEvent = (String)e.NewValue;Di2015NewLine        //If the RoutedEvent string is not null, create a new  Di2015NewLine        //dynamically created EventHandler that when run will execute  Di2015NewLine        //the actual bound ICommand instance (usually in the ViewModel)  Di2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(routedEvent))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MouseDoubleClickEventHooker eventHooker = new MouseDoubleClickEventHooker();Di2015NewLine            eventHooker.ObjectWithAttachedCommand = d;Di2015NewLine            EventInfo eventInfo = d.GetType().GetEvent(routedEvent,Di2015NewLine                BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine            //Hook up Dynamically created event handler  Di2015NewLine            if (eventInfo != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                eventInfo.AddEventHandler(d,Di2015NewLine                 eventHooker.GetNewEventHandlerToRunCommand(eventInfo));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary> Di2015NewLine/// Contains the event that is hooked into the source RoutedEvent Di2015NewLine/// that was specified to run the ICommand Di2015NewLine/// </summary> Di2015NewLinesealed class MouseDoubleClickEventHookerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region PropertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// The DependencyObject, that holds a binding to the actual Di2015NewLine    /// ICommand to execute Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    public DependencyObject ObjectWithAttachedCommand { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Public MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Creates a Dynamic EventHandler that will be run the ICommand Di2015NewLine    /// when the user specified RoutedEvent fires Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="eventInfo">The specified RoutedEvent EventInfo</param>Di2015NewLine    ///<returns>An Delegate that points to a new EventHandlerDi2015NewLine    /// that will be run the ICommand</returns>Di2015NewLine    public Delegate GetNewEventHandlerToRunCommand(EventInfo eventInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Delegate del = null;Di2015NewLine        if (eventInfo == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("eventInfo");Di2015NewLine        if (eventInfo.EventHandlerType == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("EventHandlerType is null");Di2015NewLine        if (del == null)Di2015NewLine            del = Delegate.CreateDelegate(eventInfo.EventHandlerType, this,Di2015NewLine                GetType().GetMethod("OnEventRaised",Di2015NewLine                BindingFlags.NonPublic |Di2015NewLine                BindingFlags.Instance));Di2015NewLine        return del;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine OnEventRaised(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ICommand command = (ICommand)(sender as DependencyObject).Di2015NewLine            GetValue(CommandMouseDoubleClick.TheCommandToRunProperty);Di2015NewLine        if (command != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            command.Execute(null);Di2015NewLine 2867832Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic long counter; //store and load the counter from persistent storage every time the program loads or closes.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string CreateRandomString(int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long count = System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment(ref counter);Di2015NewLine    int PasswordLength = length;Di2015NewLine    String _allowedChars = "abcdefghijkmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ23456789";Di2015NewLine    Byte[] randomBytes = new Byte[PasswordLength];Di2015NewLine    RNGCryptoServiceProvider rng = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    rng.GetBytes(randomBytes);Di2015NewLine    char[] chars = new char[PasswordLength];Di2015NewLine    int allowedCharCount = _allowedChars.Length;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < PasswordLength; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while(randomBytes[i] > byte.MaxValue - (byte.MaxValue % allowedCharCount))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] tmp = new byte[1];Di2015NewLine            rng.GetBytes(tmp);Di2015NewLine            randomBytes[i] = tmp[0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        chars[i] = _allowedChars[(int)randomBytes[i] % allowedCharCount];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    byte[] buf = new byte[8];Di2015NewLine    buf[0] = (byte) count;Di2015NewLine    buf[1] = (byte) (count >> 8);Di2015NewLine    buf[2] = (byte) (count >> 16);Di2015NewLine    buf[3] = (byte) (count >> 24);Di2015NewLine    buf[4] = (byte) (count >> 32);Di2015NewLine    buf[5] = (byte) (count >> 40);Di2015NewLine    buf[6] = (byte) (count >> 48);Di2015NewLine    buf[7] = (byte) (count >> 56);Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(buf) + new string(chars);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2867832Di2015UniqueSeparatorallowedCharCount
2867832Di2015UniqueSeparator"AQAAAAAAAAA="
2867832Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string CreateRandomString(int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    length -= 12; //12 digits are the counterDi2015NewLine    if (length <= 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("length");Di2015NewLine    long count = System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment(ref counter);Di2015NewLine    Byte[] randomBytes = new Byte[length * 3 / 4];Di2015NewLine    RNGCryptoServiceProvider rng = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    rng.GetBytes(randomBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] buf = new byte[8];Di2015NewLine    buf[0] = (byte)count;Di2015NewLine    buf[1] = (byte)(count >> 8);Di2015NewLine    buf[2] = (byte)(count >> 16);Di2015NewLine    buf[3] = (byte)(count >> 24);Di2015NewLine    buf[4] = (byte)(count >> 32);Di2015NewLine    buf[5] = (byte)(count >> 40);Di2015NewLine    buf[6] = (byte)(count >> 48);Di2015NewLine    buf[7] = (byte)(count >> 56);Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(buf) + Convert.ToBase64String(randomBytes);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2868713Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate byte[] PopulatePersonPDF(Person obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine   PdfStamper Stamper = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   tryDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      PdfCopyFields Copier = new PdfCopyFields(ms);Di2015NewLine      Copier.AddDocument(GetReader("Person.pdf"));Di2015NewLine      Copier.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      PdfReader docReader = new PdfReader(ms.ToArray());Di2015NewLine      ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine      Stamper = new PdfStamper(docReader, ms);Di2015NewLine      AcroFields Fields = Stamper.AcroFields;Di2015NewLine      Fields.SetField("FirstName", obj.FirstName);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   finallyDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      if (Stamper != null)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         Stamper.Close();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2868855Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void TransformIt(TextWriter output)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var inputDocument = XDocument.Parse(INPUT_XML);Di2015NewLine    if (inputDocument.Root == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var doc = new XDocument(Di2015NewLine        new XElement(Di2015NewLine            "responses",Di2015NewLine            from response in inputDocument.Root.Elements()Di2015NewLine            select new XElement(Di2015NewLine                "response",Di2015NewLine                from lv in GetResponseLabels(response)Di2015NewLine                select MakeResponse(lv.Label, lv.Value))));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var settings = new XmlWriterSettingsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Encoding = Encoding.UTF8,Di2015NewLine        Indent = true,Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    using (var writer = XmlWriter.Create(output, settings))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (writer == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        doc.WriteTo(writer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static XElement MakeResponse(string label, string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var trimmedLabel = label.Replace(" ", String.Empty).Replace("?", String.Empty);Di2015NewLine    return new XElement(trimmedLabel, value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<LabelAndValue> GetResponseLabels(XContainer response)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var fieldsElement = response.Element("fields");Di2015NewLine    if (fieldsElement == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return from field in fieldsElement.Elements("field")Di2015NewLine           let valueElement = field.Element("value")Di2015NewLine           let labelElement = field.Element("label")Di2015NewLine           select new LabelAndValueDi2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine               Label = labelElement == null ? "Unknown" : labelElement.Value,Di2015NewLine               Value = valueElement == null ? null : valueElement.ValueDi2015NewLine           };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate struct LabelAndValueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Label { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2871279Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class HexEncoding : EncodingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static readonly HexEncoding Hex = new HexEncoding( );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly char[] HexAlphabet;Di2015NewLine    private static readonly byte[] HexValues;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static HexEncoding( )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 2871817Di2015UniqueSeparator<script type="text/javascript">Di2015NewLine    function countdown_clock(clockID, year, month, day, hour, minute) {Di2015NewLine        countdown(clockID, year, month, day, hour, minute);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    function countdown(clockID, year, month, day, hour, minute) {Di2015NewLine        Today = new Date();Di2015NewLine        Todays_Year = Today.getFullYear();Di2015NewLine        Todays_Month = Today.getMonth();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Convert both today's date and the target date into miliseconds.                           Di2015NewLine        Todays_Date = (new Date(Todays_Year, Todays_Month, Today.getDate(),Di2015NewLine                             Today.getHours(), Today.getMinutes(), Today.getSeconds())).getTime();Di2015NewLine        Target_Date = (new Date(year, month - 1, day, hour, minute, 00)).getTime();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Find their difference, and convert that into seconds.                  Di2015NewLine        Time_Left = Math.round((Target_Date - Todays_Date) / 1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Time_Left < 0)Di2015NewLine            Time_Left = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        days = Math.floor(Time_Left / (60 * 60 * 24));Di2015NewLine        Time_Left %= (60 * 60 * 24);Di2015NewLine        hours = Math.floor(Time_Left / (60 * 60));Di2015NewLine        Time_Left %= (60 * 60);Di2015NewLine        minutes = Math.floor(Time_Left / 60);Di2015NewLine        Time_Left %= 60;Di2015NewLine        seconds = Time_Left;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dps = 's'; hps = 's'; mps = 's'; sps = 's';Di2015NewLine        //ps is short for plural suffix.Di2015NewLine        if (days == 1) dps = '';Di2015NewLine        if (hours == 1) hps = '';Di2015NewLine        if (minutes == 1) mps = '';Di2015NewLine        if (seconds == 1) sps = '';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var clock = document.getElementById(clockID);Di2015NewLine        clock.innerHTML = days + ' day' + dps + ' ';Di2015NewLine        clock.innerHTML += hours + ' hour' + hps + ' ';Di2015NewLine        clock.innerHTML += minutes + ' minute' + mps + ' and ';Di2015NewLine        clock.innerHTML += seconds + ' second' + sps;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Recursive call, keeps the clock ticking.Di2015NewLine        setTimeout('countdown("' + clockID + '",' + year + ',' + month + ',' + day + ',' + hour + ',' + minute + ');', 1000);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine</script>Di2015NewLine
2871817Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override void OnPreRender(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime endDate = new DateTime(2010, 6, 1, 0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        string script = string.Format("countdown_clock('clock', {0}, {1}, {2}, {3}, {4});", endDate.Year, endDate.Month, endDate.Day, endDate.Hour, endDate.Minute);Di2015NewLine        ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript(this, this.GetType(), "countdown", script, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.OnPreRender(e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2872800Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TSource Last<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    IList<TSource> list = source as IList<TSource>;Di2015NewLine    if (list != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int count = list.Count;Di2015NewLine        if (count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return list[count - 1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (IEnumerator<TSource> enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TSource current;Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while (enumerator.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                return current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw Error.NoElements();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2876285Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetContainsId<User>(ids, repo)
2876285Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<T> GetContainsId<T>(List<int> ids, SimpleRepository repo)Di2015NewLine    where T : Record, new() // `Record` is a base class with property IdDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression x = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "x");Di2015NewLine    LambdaExpression expr;Di2015NewLine    if (ids.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        expr = Expression.Lambda(LambdaExpression.Constant(false), x);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        expr = Expression.Lambda(BuildEqual(x, ids.ToArray()), x);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return repo.Find<T>((Expression<Func<T,bool>>)expr).ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate BinaryExpression BuildEqual(ParameterExpression x, int id)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MemberExpression left = Expression.Property(x, "Id");Di2015NewLine    ConstantExpression right = Expression.Constant(id);Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Equal(left, right);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate BinaryExpression BuildEqual(ParameterExpression x, int[] ids, int pos = 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int id = ids[pos];Di2015NewLine    pos++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (pos == ids.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return BuildEqual(x, id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.OrElse(BuildEqual(x, ids, pos), BuildEqual(x, id));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2876289Di2015UniqueSeparatorStreamReader streamReader = new StreamReader(@"c:\\survey.txt");Di2015NewLinestring source = streamReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine
2876289Di2015UniqueSeparatorchar[] punctuation = new char[] {' ', '\\n', '\\r', '\\t', '(', ')', '"'};Di2015NewLinestring[] tokens = source.ToLower().Split(punctuation, true); Di2015NewLine
2876289Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar firstPass = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLineforeach(string token in tokens)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!firstPass.ContainsKey(token))Di2015NewLine        firstPass[token] = 1;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        ++firstPass[token];Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine
2876289Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar groups = from pair in firstPassDi2015NewLine             group pair.Key by pair.Value;Di2015NewLine
2876289Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar sorted = from group in groupsDi2015NewLine             orderby group.KeyDi2015NewLine             select group;Di2015NewLine
2876289Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach(var g in sorted.Take(100))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine("Words with count {0}:", g.Key);Di2015NewLine  foreach(var w in g)Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(w);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2876294Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Size GetPreferredSize(String text, Font font, StringFormat format)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Graphics graphics = this.CreateGraphics();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (format == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        format = new StringFormat();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SizeF textSize = SizeF.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The minimum width allowed for the rectangle.Di2015NewLine    double minWidth = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The ratio for the height compared to the width.Di2015NewLine    double heightRatio = 0.61803399; // Gloden ratio to make it look pretty :)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The amount to in/decrement for width.Di2015NewLine    double step = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The new width to be set.Di2015NewLine    double newWidth = minWidth;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Find the largest width that the text fits into.Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        textSize = graphics.MeasureString(text, font, (int)Math.Round(newWidth), format);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (textSize.Height <= newWidth * heightRatio)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        newWidth += step;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    step /= 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Continuously divide the step to adjust the rectangle.Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Ensure step.Di2015NewLine        if (step < 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Ensure minimum width.Di2015NewLine        if (newWidth - step < minWidth)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Try to subract the step from the width.Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Measure the text.Di2015NewLine            textSize = graphics.MeasureString(text, font, (int)Math.Round(newWidth - step), format);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the text height is going to be less than the new height, decrease the new width.Di2015NewLine            // Otherwise, break to the next lowest step.Di2015NewLine            if (textSize.Height < (newWidth - step) * heightRatio)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newWidth -= step;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        step /= 2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double width = newWidth;Di2015NewLine    double height = width * heightRatio;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new Size((int)Math.Ceiling(width), (int)Math.Ceiling(height));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2877356Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static T ReturnAs<T>(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var item = new MyType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Option 1 - Implicit cast. Compile time checked but takes two lines.Di2015NewLine        IMyType item2 = item;Di2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine(item2.SayHello());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Option 2 - One line but risks an InvalidCastException at runtime if MyType changes.Di2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine(((IMyType)item).SayHello());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Option 3 - One line but risks a NullReferenceException at runtime if MyType changes.Di2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine((item as IMyType).SayHello());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Option 4 - compile time one linerDi2015NewLine        Converter.ReturnAs<IMyType>(item).SayHello();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2877619Di2015UniqueSeparator    public List<T> RemoveDuplicates<T>(List<T> elems)Di2015NewLine    {                           //  ^Di2015NewLine        HashSet<T> uniques = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in elems)Di2015NewLine            uniques.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        elems = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        int cnt = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in uniques)Di2015NewLine            elems[cnt++] = item;Di2015NewLine        return elems;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
